programme.title: Glen Campbell: The Rhinestone Cowboy

Featuring contributions by family, friends and colleagues including Jimmy Webb, Micky Dolenz and Bob Harris

programme.title: The Flying Gardener
programme.desc: Chris Beardshaw visits a Loch Fyne oyster fisherman who needs help with his overgrown shady garden, and finds out why Scots design the best shady gardens

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: A retired sheepdog takes to rounding up cars, and James is challenged to a race. Rural drama based on the novels of James Herriot, starring Christopher Timothy, Peter Davison and Robert Hardy

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
programme.desc: Television arrives in the Dales, and Siegfried thinks he is the ideal candidate to treat a dog with a weak heart. Rural drama, starring Christopher Timothy and Robert Hardy

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Having come to the end of her maternity leave, Paula prepares to return to a demanding job at a start-up company. She and her husband Jerôme decide to hire an au pair and recruit Tess, a polished and personable young woman, who gets on wonderfully with the baby and their two teenagers. But Paula experiences increasing feelings of unease as strange domestic incidents start to multiply, casting her in the light of a bad mother. French psychological thriller, starring Melanie Doutey

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Paulas psychiatrist suggests that she is suffering from postpartum depression and that she should take a leave of absence,. Paula discovers that the nanny they were supposed to interview just before Tess has been assaulted, and her suspicions only grow. Jerôme doesnt share her doubts and the couple are torn apart, rekindling older rifts. French psychological thriller, starring Melanie Doutey

programme.title: Wogan
programme.desc: Terry Wogan is joined by Margaret Baird, Betty Astell, Dickie Bird and Anthony Sher, while ther is music from Aztec Camera and Elio Pace. First broadcast in 1988

programme.title: Dickie Bird: A Rare Species
programme.desc: Harry Gration narrates a 1996 profile of the former cricket umpire, who died last month, looking at his life on and off the field and featuring contributions from well-known faces

programme.title: The Good Life
programme.desc: Tom and Barbara make a small profit and spend the money on a loom, while Margo persuades Jerry to buy her a spinning wheel. Self-sufficiency comedy, starring Richard Briers and Felicity Kendal

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: On his arrival at Number 10, Jim Hacker is confronted by a confusing nuclear deterrent problem, made more difficult by Sir Humphreys constant meddling. The new PM soon realises his powers do not stretch to domestic affairs. Political comedy, starring Paul Eddington and Nigel Hawthorne

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Jeanette Kwakye and Gordon Smart host the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Crimewatch Live
programme.desc: How police solved the murder of Anita Rose, who was killed in 2024. The Met are urging victims of a rapist with a foot fetish who worked as a hotel manager to come forward

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and the team explore a mid-terrace cottage in Kent, a two-bedroom semi-detached house with an impressive garden in Suffolk and a four-bedroom terrace property near Coventry, all sold at auctions. Two homes are destined for the rental market, while the third becomes a labour of love for its new owner who plans to make it his home

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: At Southwell Racecourse in Nottinghamshire, sisters Helen and Catherine on the red team, take on the blues, friends Emma and Lizzie. Presenter Natasha Raskin Sharp checks out an impressive collection of vintage cash registers, while experts Roo Irvine and Phil Serrell hope for golden gavels

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Sister Boniface Mysteries
programme.desc: Peggy is delighted when Radio Catherine, her favourite pirate radio station, begins transmitting from Great Slaughter, one step ahead of the GPO engineer determined to bring them to justice. When their top DJ is murdered on-air, Sister Boniface is called in to investigate. Lorna Watson stars

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: In the stunning landscapes of north-west Wales, Sonali Shah meets a couple from Warwickshire who have a dream of owning a property that would provide them with a home and the ability to offer holiday lets. While in the region, Sonali meets a paddle-boarding campaigner helping to rid the area of plastic pollution

programme.title: The Repair Shop
programme.desc: First into the workshop is Ben who brings with him his late sisters dress that once served as the muse for her art. Dominic Chinea and Rebecca Bissonnet attempt to restore the dress to its former glory so Ben can display it as part of a posthumous show. Richard brings in a damaged drum that was once the beating heart of an old Cornish May Day festival and Emma from Dudley is hoping the experts can repair her old clocking-in clock. Rob, Mark, Adam and Nick bring in a polo bike and mallet

programme.title: The Inner Circle
programme.desc: Amanda Holden hosts the quiz show where players must outsmart each other to win big. Six players are each randomly assigned a secret stash of cash, anything between zero and £4,000. Each player only knows their own value before being thrown into a battle of wits, nerve, and strategic gameplay across a series of challenging rounds

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Trevor Nelson for the brainy quiz where the contestants try to score as few points as possible. As ever, players attempt to come up with the answers no-one else could think of

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Lauren Laverne co-hosts the usual mix of celebrity guests and stories about people in extraordinary circumstances

programme.title: Live International Football
programme.desc: Northern Ireland v Slovakia (Kick-off 7.45pm). Stephen Watson presents all the action from the FIFA World Cup Group A qualifier, held at Windsor Park. Northern Ireland won their opening match in the group 3-1 in Luxembourg, before putting in a credible performance away to Germany but eventually losing by the same scoreline. The Slovaks have maximum points so far after claiming a fine 2-0 win at home to the Germans, before producing a considerably less inspiring performance in Luxembourg, but still prevailing thanks to a last-minute goal. This is the first meeting between the side since a UEFA Euro 2020 play-off here, which Slovakia won 2-1 after extra time, with Michal Duris scoring the winning goal

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: Julia Roberts talks about her latest role in psychological campus drama After the Hunt. Colin Farrell discusses playing a con man and gambling addict in atmospheric thriller Ballad of a Small Player. Singer Gloria Estefan introduces her new Spanish-language album Raices. And Benedict Cumberbatch talks about playing a newly widowed father in The Thing with Feathers. Plus, Robbie Williams performs Pretty Face from the forthcoming album BRITPOP

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The queens take on a hyperpop banger for the Girl Group challenge. Girls Aloud star Nadine Coyle joins RuPaul, Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel

programme.title: Ghost Stories
programme.desc: Professor Philip Goodman, famous for debunking hoaxes and ghost sightings, is given a dossier of three terrifying, unsolvable cases by his hero and role model Charles Cameron, who has been missing, presumed dead, for years. Can Goodman explain what even Cameron could not? Horror anthology, starring Andy Nyman, Martin Freeman and Paul Whitehouse

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Live
programme.desc: Alex Jones is joined by chefs Bryn Williams, Andi Oliver and Ravneet Gill, and by special guest Ben Elton. Drinks expert Olly Smith picks the wines to go with the studio dishes

programme.title: Rick Steins Cornwall
programme.desc: Rick visits a deer farm near Bodmin Moor run by Pip and Matt Smith, before returning to the kitchen in Padstow to make a simple venison Wellington. Later, he spends an afternoon on Porthgwarra beach with the artist Hannah Woodman, whose work is inspired by the sea-worn landscape of west Cornwall, before defining the Cornish sense of humour over a pint with comedian Jonny Cowling

programme.desc: Tommy Walsh sees the potential in a bungalow in the beautiful Norfolk Broads, while Dion Dublin is on familiar turf in both Stoke and Coventry with two intriguing projects

programme.title: Money for Nothing
programme.desc: Jacqui Joseph tries out a bold peacock design on a sideboard, but will her efforts leave her fanning out the cash?

programme.title: Garden Rescue
programme.desc: Ben and Shelleys new-build garden in Wing, Buckinghamshire, is sloped, impractical and has a tiny patio. Having travelled extensively across Europe, the couple yearn for a Mediterranean courtyard-style garden to remind them of their adventures abroad. It must also feature a childrens play zone for youngsters Eva and Maya. Siblings David and Harry Rich vie with Arit Anderson to help the pair transform this troublesome space

programme.title: DIY SOS
programme.desc: In south Wales, Nick Knowles and the team help Dan and Anna after an accident. Now a wheelchair user, Dan needs his home transformed to support his rehab and his goal to walk again

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Denise Nurse helps two Eurovision enthusiasts and their cat to find a new home in the Cumbrian countryside, and meets a young family of keen climbers and outdoor adventurers

programme.desc: Lawrence Chaney, Hannah Cockroft, Rick Edwards, Darren Harriott, Sarah Parish and Fay Ripley take part in the quiz show in which contestants and their celebrity partners must outsmart each other to win a cash prize. Hosted by Amanda Holden

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing
programme.desc: Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman present movie week, in which the couples take to the dance floor to perform routines inspired by, or paying tribute to, Hollywood films. Adding to the theme, theres an appearance from Wicked star Cynthia Erivo, while judges Shirley Ballas, Craig Revel Horwood, Motsi Mabuse and Anton Du Beke give their thoughts on the performances

programme.title: The Weakest Link
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan hosts a battle of the nations special, featuring two contestants from each of the UKs home countries. With Gordon Smart and Amy Macdonald representing Scotland, Paul Brand and Josie DArby playing for Wales, Stephen Mangan and Leomie Anderson for England, and Jamie-Lee ODonnell and Bronagh Waugh representing Northern Ireland

programme.title: Nine Bodies in a Mexican Morgue
programme.desc: The survivors work out how to call for help but are faced with a treacherous climb. As some of the group begin to crack under the pressure, a third death, the most violent so far, warns them that they are running out of time

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
programme.desc: When a single mum and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather Egon Spengler left behind. Supernatural comedy sequel, directed by Jason Reitman and starring Carrie Coon, Paul Rudd, Finn Wolfhard and Mckenna Grace, with cameo appearances by Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Ernie Hudson, Annie Potts and Sigourney Weaver

programme.title: Twisted Metal
programme.desc: John and Quiet find themselves caught in a trap. Agent Stone tests the loyalty of his new recruits

programme.title: Twisted Metal

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A look at the work of some of historys greatest artists, from the first images painted onto the walls of caves through to Chris Ofilis work with elephant poo

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A look at the worlds greatest heroes and villains, from the first men on the moon and Martin Luther King Jr to Al Capone and Rameses the Great

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May visit Albania to test three luxury vehicles - the Rolls-Royce Ghost, Bentley Mulsanne and Mercedes-Benz S65 AMG. Jeremy also drives three high-performance hatchbacks in the form of the limited-edition Ford Focus RS500, Prodrive-developed Cosworth Impreza STi CS400 and one-off Volvo C30 PPC. Jonathan Ross is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: Drama, starring Aimee Lou Wood and Nabhaan Rizwan as best friends retreating from reality into a world of movies. However, change is coming to their lives whether they like it or not

programme.title: Film Club
programme.desc: While Noa attends a taster day for his new job in Bristol, Evie pulls out all the stops for Film Club - theres a lot riding on tonight. Drama, starring Aimee Lou Wood and Nabhaan Rizwan

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: Crew members of a cargo spacecraft answer a distress call from a derelict alien vessel. However, their mission of mercy has fatal repercussions when a deadly, seemingly indestructible monster gets on board their ship and starts killing them one by one. Ridley Scotts sci-fi horror, starring Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, Ian Holm, John Hurt, Harry Dean Stanton, Yaphet Kotto and Veronica Cartwright

programme.title: Blackmailed: The Sextortion Killers
programme.desc: Reporter Tir Dhondy investigates the rise of sextortion scams targeting teenage boys on social media, including the case of 16-year-old victim Evan Boettler. Her journey leads to Nigeria, where she confronts the scammers taking part in these crimes. With unprecedented access and interviews with industry insiders, Tir exposes a disturbing online underworld and its devastating consequences

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The queens take on a hyperpop banger for the Girl Group challenge. Girls Aloud star Nadine Coyle joins RuPaul, Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel

programme.title: My Mates a Bad Date
programme.desc: Larisa is fed up of hearing about her best mate Damis latest in a long line of dating fails. He walks out mid-date, interrogates and pulls girls up on their outfits, music choices and lifestyle, and thinks theyre lucky to have him! Its time for an intervention. Larisa enlists the help of Gen Zs most trusted sex and relationships expert Oloni to put the 24-year-old Londoner on the spot and help him own up to his disastrous dating habits

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon as a British-Jamaican film-maker facing the day-to-day struggles of being an independent creative trying to survive in London. Kwabena searches for his first directing job, but only finds scripts built on tired black stereotypes. With time running out, he considers whether to take any job or hold out for integrity. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon, Dani Moseley and Demmy Ladipo

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabenas long-awaited break comes with Sin and Subterfuge, a radical colour-blind Regency drama. What at first feels like a dream project soon raises unsettling questions and Kwabena tries to find a solution. A spark with talented actress comes at the worst possible time when an old flame resurfaces. Meanwhile, Funmi and Maurice sharpen their airs and graces in a bid to secure Mayowa a place at the boroughs top nursery. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabenas first day on set finds him working with his hero, legendary actor Rudolph Williams. Determined to support the veteran performer, his good intentions are tested by the relentless demands of the shoot. To make matters worse, Vanessa weighs heavily on his mind, after their run-in brings up feelings he struggles to ignore. Maurice and Funmi are called in by the nursery after an altercation between Mayowa and another child, but are surprised to find things arent as they first assumed. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: Laugh Lessons
programme.sub-title: The Secret Life of an Influencer
programme.desc: Walsalls top social media talent Manrika reveals how to be a successful and in-demand influencer, including tips on interacting with followers, promoting an aspirational lifestyle, selling healthy habits and negotiating hotel stays. Comedy, starring Manrika Khaira

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: Part two of two. The Time Lord is trapped by an army of Weeping Angels, and his only chance of escape is to climb through the wreckage of the space liner that crashed into the temple. In the forest vault, Amy faces an even more deadly attack. Matt Smith and Karen Gillan are again joined by Alex Kingston as River Song

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The time travellers head off to 16th-century Venice, where not only is the city sealed off to protect residents from the plague, but they are also trapped with a coven of vampires. As the Doctor tries to deal with the threat, he crosses swords with Rosanna, the scheming head of the House of Calvierri. Helen McCrory and Lucian Msamati guest star alongside Matt Smith and Karen Gillan

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: First episode of the comedy about the romance between a couple with differing cultures and backgrounds. Gavin and Stacey have flirted for months on the phone at work but have never met up - until she travels from Wales to London to see him. Mathew Horne and Joanna Page star alongside Rob Brydon, Alison Steadman, Ruth Jones and James Corden

programme.title: Gavin and Stacey
programme.desc: The couple have their first lovers tiff and Gavin is so beside himself with worry he drives all the way to Barry Island to resolve things. Stacey finally agrees to return to Billericay with her beau, prompting his proud mum Pamela to set about cleaning the house from top to bottom. Mathew Horne and Joanna Page star

programme.title: RuPauls Drag Race UK
programme.desc: The queens take on a hyperpop banger for the Girl Group challenge. Girls Aloud star Nadine Coyle joins RuPaul, Michelle Visage and Graham Norton on the judging panel

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon as a British-Jamaican film-maker facing the day-to-day struggles of being an independent creative trying to survive in London. Kwabena searches for his first directing job, but only finds scripts built on tired black stereotypes. With time running out, he considers whether to take any job or hold out for integrity. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon, Dani Moseley and Demmy Ladipo

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabenas long-awaited break comes with Sin and Subterfuge, a radical colour-blind Regency drama. What at first feels like a dream project soon raises unsettling questions and Kwabena tries to find a solution. A spark with talented actress comes at the worst possible time when an old flame resurfaces. Meanwhile, Funmi and Maurice sharpen their airs and graces in a bid to secure Mayowa a place at the boroughs top nursery. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: Dreaming Whilst Black
programme.desc: Kwabenas first day on set finds him working with his hero, legendary actor Rudolph Williams. Determined to support the veteran performer, his good intentions are tested by the relentless demands of the shoot. To make matters worse, Vanessa weighs heavily on his mind, after their run-in brings up feelings he struggles to ignore. Maurice and Funmi are called in by the nursery after an altercation between Mayowa and another child, but are surprised to find things arent as they first assumed. Comedy, starring Adjani Salmon

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Donna inherits a house, but receives a strange warning never to open the cupboard under the stairs. Louise confides in a police psychotherapist and Jonny feels too scared to go outside after the shooting - so Janet resorts to starving him out

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Janet announces she is pregnant, much to Jonnys delight. Gaz leaps into action to foil Louises blackmail scheme, and Donna discovers selling the house is going to make her rich. Ralf Little and Sheridan Smith star

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Jonny decides to prove his responsibility by learning to drive, but his efforts come to an abrupt halt when Louise holds his car hostage. Donna splits from Gaz and resolves to take revenge on Janet - but eventually decides to leave the country instead

programme.title: Two Pints of Lager and a Packet of Crisps
programme.desc: Jonny offers to provide some under-age kids with alcohol, but having been banned from the off-licence, it falls to Louise to provide the goods. When she returns empty-handed, all hell breaks loose. Donna decides she needs to find new friends, while Gaz goes in search of casual sex

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Documentary following boxer Tommy Furys return to the ring. Tommy is at his lowest point personally and professionally, living alone in a house that was meant to be his and partner Molly-Maes forever home. His role as a father to baby Bambi brings both joy and pressure as he tries to convince Molly-Mae he is a changed man. After finally getting the medical all-clear to fight again, Tommy and his trainer and father John prepare for his return to the ring against MMA fighter Darren Till. Team Fury travels to the press conference - with John promising to be on his best behaviour

Being huge fans, Shaggy and Scooby have brought the rest of the gang to the grand opening. But, they’re not alone. The GHOST of a famous bandleader from the 1930s is haunting the Youth Center, which is located on the spot of the famous old Athena Supper Club. Our mystery teens work with REV RUN to get to the bottom of this mystery, find the legendary golden microphone lost over eighty years ago and get the Youth Center back up and RUNNING Rev style (pun fully intended).

programme.desc: Zahra-Roses family is from Somalia, a country situated on the east coast of Africa. In Somalia, they have the traditional dish of nafaqo, which is boiled egg wrapped in mashed potato. This is what Zahra-Rose has chosen to make for her friends. To begin with, Zahra-Rose seasons mashed potato with salt, black pepper, flour, ground cumin, ground coriander, turmeric powder and fresh coriander. She then wraps the potato mixture around her special ingredient, hard-boiled eggs, rolls them in breadcrumbs and puts them in the oven to be cooked. Zahra-Rose also serves a fresh chilli sauce, so her friends can use it for dipping. Not only does Zahra-Rose have beautiful decorations, she also has a surprise picnic planned. Will her friends realise what her special ingredient is?

programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how lavender plays an important role in the environment. They find out that lavender attracts pollinators like bees and butterflies, who love its smell, but that its scent can also help keep garden pests away. On the way, they take some cuttings to help new lavender to grow and find out just how calming the smell of lavender can be for people too.

programme.title: Greg Davies: The Back of My Mums Head

The tour received rave reviews and was extended to 94 dates, including multiple sell-out nights at Londons Hammersmith Apollo and Southbank Centre

The Italian road trip takes in a holiday lodge made almost entirely from glass in the Dolomites

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.desc: A poverty-stricken squire spies an opportunity to make his dreams come true when his employer dies. He takes his place as a knight, launching himself on the road to riches by competing in jousting tournaments, but his ruse is jeopardised by a dastardly nobleman. Comedy adventure, starring Heath Ledger, Paul Bettany, Mark Addy, Shannyn Sossamon and Rufus Sewell

programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer revisit successful buyers from seasons past. In 2017 mother and daughter Linda and Laura bought a flat in Bristol with Phils help that would suit Laura and her partner until they found their own home and Linda would move in with her husband when they retired. In 2018 Ranald and Marjorie were looking for a bigger home to hold family get-togethers with enough bedrooms for all the grandkids. Now Kirstie and Phil are back to see if the properties they bought were everything they hoped for

programme.title: Kirstie and Phils Love It or List It
programme.desc: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer are in Chippenham to help Tim and Sonia decide whether to sell or renovate their home. Eight years ago, the couple moved into Tims childhood home to take care of his elderly mother. Nowshe has died, Tim and daughter Ella are ready to move on to a fresh start in a new home, but Sonia thinks with a little work they can start their new chapter without having to move

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Kevin McCloud returns to West Sussex to meet with Olaf and Fritha who, in 2019, set out to build their own oasis on a piece of land that is boxed in by a railway line and an A-road. Due to an underground mains sewer, they were unable to build on half their plot and were left with a small triangle on which to build a three-bedroom house. They began with only £190,000 and were immediately surprised at the price of the sturdy retaining walls and foundations they needed to combat traffic vibrations and the sharp, pointed angles of the hand-built timber frame stretched Olaf to his limits. Kevin returns to see how life has gone for the pair and their new young daughter Lagertha in their triangular house

programme.title: Bettany Hughes Treasures of the World
programme.desc: Bettany lifts the lid on the most remarkable treasures of civilisation to investigate the story of humanity. In this episode, she heads for Croatia where she begins her journey on the island of Korcula, diving with archaeologists to uncover a Neolithic settlement that offers a glimpse into early coastal life. On the mainland, Bettany explores Diocletians Palace in Split, discovering how the fortress became the heart of the Eastern Roman Empire

programme.title: Great British Train Journeys from Above
programme.desc: Hugh Bonneville narrates the most iconic steam train journeys in Britain. The first episode tracks the Jacobite Railway, which runs through the Scottish Highlands from Fort William to Mallaig. The programme visits the site of Bonnie Prince Charlies hideout, and explores the history of the Jacobite Rebellion

programme.title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent

Comedy, starring Cage as himself, alongside Pedro Pascal, Tiffany Haddish and Neil Patrick Harris

programme.title: Le Mans 66
programme.desc: Racing car driver and engineer Carroll Shelby is lured out of retirement during the 1960s, in a period where the sport is dominated by Italian companies. Ford Motors are hoping to revive their flagging fortunes by launching a racing division and securing a high-profile win at the prestigious Le Mans 24-hour race. Shelby takes up the challenge of headlining the plan to build a revolutionary new race car, but courts conflict within the company by recruiting unpredictable, short-tempered British driver Ken Miles to take the wheel. Fact-based drama, starring Matt Damon, Christian Bale, Jon Bernthal and Caitriona Balfe

programme.title: Julie Andrews at 90: In Her Own Words
programme.desc: A profile of the singer and actress as she turns 90, celebrating a career that has spanned more than eight decades, from child prodigy to global superstar. Featuring performances of Wouldnt It Be Loverly and I Could Have Danced All Night from My Fair Lady on The Ed Sullivan Show, and Julie and comedian Carol Burnett spoofing the Von Trapp family at Carnegie Hall. Featuring contributions by Karen Dotrice, Angela Cartwright and Millicent Martin

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: National and international news

programme.title: Clarence House: The Kings Private Home
programme.desc: A look at the home of King Charles and Queen Camilla, a stately Georgian mansion on the Mall in the City of Westminster. Tucked away from the tourist trail, Clarence House is somewhere the royals have always been free to be themselves - to fall in love, to celebrate, to argue, and to mourn. Royal historians, journalists and biographers divulge the stories of this residence, and the VIPs who have called it home

programme.title: Princess Anne: The Power Behind the Throne
programme.desc: A look at the Princess Royals role in the royal family, revealing how she has blazed a trail throughout her life, while quietly redefining what it means to serve. Alongside her duties and raising a family, Princess Anne continues to support charities close to her heart and in the process has notched up another groundbreaking first, receiving a nomination for the Nobel Peace Prize. Featuring colourful archive, including TV appearances on Wogan, Question of Sport and Parkinson

programme.title: Harry and Meghan: Royal Hypocrites?
programme.desc: The Duke and Duchess of Sussex have been plagued by allegations of hypocrisy and double standards, demanding their privacy then chasing the spotlight. They asked to leave the royal family, then continued to trade on their royal credentials. Are they victims of press persecution, or are these allegations fair? This documentary investigates the long list of contradictions at the heart of Prince Harry and his wifes post-royal life, featuring analysis, insider testimonies and a deep dive into the couples evolving brand. The programme explores whether their actions align with their stated values, looking at the headlines, the deals and the drama

programme.title: Most Shocking Celebrity Moments
programme.desc: The very worst celebrity career catastrophes, from Roseannes racist tweet and angry apology to Kendall Jenners tone-deaf Pepsi advert that saw her ridiculed across the world. Plus, Angus Deaton and Frank Boughs various trysts with sex workers, and cheating courtesy of former cyclist Lance Armstrong. With contributions by Len Goodman, James and Ola Jordan, Vanessa Feltz, Louis Walsh, Sinitta and Bobby Norris

programme.title: Churchill
programme.desc: Documentary exploring the life of one of Britains most iconic Prime Ministers, Winston Churchill. It begins with his early years, when he is driven by the desire to prove himself to his father. He is born into aristocracy in the grand family home of Bleinhem Palace. From a young age he is acutely aware he has a lot to live up to. His father, Randolph Churchill, is an ambitious, controversial, highly successful politician and a strict disciplinarian who fails to give young Winston the affection he craves. Churchill never gets the chance to reconcile with his father and channels his sense of loss at his untimely death into a fierce determination to succeed at all costs

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang celebrates New Years Eve with a party at Monica and Rachels flat, while Ross tries to alleviate his loneliness by getting a new room-mate - a monkey. Comedy, starring Courteney Cox and David Schwimmer

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandlers flamboyant mother breezes into town for an appearance on The Jay Leno Show to talk about her career as a writer of erotic fiction - and throws her embarrassed son into a panic by inviting everyone out to dinner. Meanwhile, Monica and Phoebe compete for the attention of a man in a coma. Guest starring Morgan Fairchild and Jay Leno

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Dozen Lasagnes
programme.desc: Monica finds herself with a dozen large lasagnes on her hands, and Rachel ends her relationship with Paolo because he made a pass at Phoebe. Meanwhile, Joey and Chandler are shopping for new kitchen furniture when a football table catches their eye

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Chandler catches a glimpse of Rachel in the nude - so she promptly demands he bare all to redress the balance. Meanwhile, Joey is disturbed to hear his father is having an affair. With a guest appearance by Brenda Vaccaro

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Candy Hearts
programme.desc: Ross bumps into his ex-wife, while Chandler meets an old flame during a double date with Joey, and Rachel, Monica and Phoebe have a run-in with some firefighters

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Stoned Guy
programme.desc: Monica applies to become head chef in a fancy restaurant, but the owner proves to be so high on drugs he is unable to appreciate the food she prepares to impress him. Guest starring Melora Hardin (The Office: An American Workplace) and Jon Lovitz

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Two Parts - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Phoebe feels neglected when she learns that Joey has fallen in love with her identical twin, while Chandler experiences trouble when he is asked to fire an attractive employee. Ross had last-minute doubts about becoming a parent. Guest starring Helen Hunt

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with Two Parts - Part Two
programme.desc: Part two of two. Rachel and Monica fall out over two hunky doctors, played by Noah Wyle and George Clooney, while Ross muses with his father on impending parenthood. Emmy-nominated episode of the American comedy, with Jennifer Aniston, Courteney Cox, David Schwimmer and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Poker
programme.desc: Rachel and Monica suffer a humiliating defeat while playing poker with Chandler and Joey, and demand a rematch. Rachel decides to look for a new job - but is not as successful as she had hoped

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where the Monkey Gets Away
programme.desc: Rachel loses Rosss pet monkey, prompting the gang to form a search party to find it, but an animal warden with a grudge gets in the way. Comedy, starring Jennifer Aniston and David Schwimmer

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Evil Orthodontist
programme.desc: Chandler finds it tough being ignored by a woman he has just taken out on a first date, and Rachel gets back with her double-dealing former fiance Barry - even though he is now engaged to someone else. Guest starring Jennifer Grey

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Fake Monica
programme.desc: Ross tries to find a new home for his pet monkey, which has reached puberty and begun driving everyone crazy with its uncontrollable antics. Meanwhile, Monica sets out to catch the thief responsible for stealing her credit card. Comedy, starring David Schwimmer and Courteney Cox

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with the Ick Factor
programme.desc: Chandler finds his colleagues treat him differently since his promotion. Monica dates a high-school senior, and Rosss ex-wife goes into labour, while Rachel has a strange dream. Comedy, starring Matthew Perry and David Schwimmer

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Carol finally gives birth, but Ross and Susan nearly miss out on the big event thanks to Phoebe, who locks them in a cupboard to stop them bickering. Meanwhile, Joey comes to the rescue of a pregnant woman at the hospital

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Finds Out
programme.desc: When Chandler lets slip that Ross has secretly been in love with Rachel since ninth grade, the other women persuade Rachel to date Ross, though her initial hesitation is taken by Ross as a rejection. programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebes big day arrives, but wedding planner Monica and stand-in father of the bride Joey take their roles a little too seriously. To make matters worse, a blizzard hits New York and one of Mikes ushers is indisposed, forcing Ross and Chandler to step into the breach

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Livvy seems intent on moving on as she goes on her first date with Kit, and Jack asks Jules flatmate Maddison on a date. Arman has got both Tabitha and Yas back on side, but the DJ seems to be playing a dangerous game. Meanwhile, Jazz confides in Jules and Jack that Demi has said she doesnt trust her. Alice and Sam Vanderpump have some big news to break to their friends

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: In this revisit episode, chef Gordon Ramsay goes back to Mojito, the Junction (formerly known as Flamangos) and Bazzini to check in with the owners he helped in the past and find out whether his advice has been put to good use. Will he be pleased with their progress?

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula opens a luxury resort for monsters, to provide a refuge from terrified humans. His cosy sanctuary is disrupted when a normal man unwittingly checks in, and the situation is complicated when the unwanted guest takes a liking to the counts daughter. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: A climatologist warns global warming will soon result in destructive freak weather, or even another ice age. He thinks the world still has time to prepare for the worst, but the crisis happens almost immediately - and as storms, earthquakes and hurricanes strike in terrifying fashion, he races across America to rescue his son from a frozen New York. Disaster thriller, with Jake Gyllenhaal and Dennis Quaid

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer proposes to Marge for the second time when he discovers their marriage licence is invalid, but the ceremony does not proceed without a hitch. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta and Julie Kavner

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer becomes a doting father and decides to spend quality time with his youngest daughter when he discovers Santas Little Helper knows Maggie better than he does. Meanwhile, a lonely Moe joins an online dating agency, and gets a pleasant surprise when he meets an attractive woman

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer has his driving licence revoked for being a menace to other road-users, forcing Marge to take charge of the family car and run endless errands for everyone - a responsibility she soon starts to resent. Featuring the guest voices of Steve Busmen and singer-songwriter Jackson Browne

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart gets into trouble with the police for vandalising Flanders Beatles memorabilia, so Marge sends him on an organised activity scheme to make sure he is supervised at all times. Unfortunately, Homer is appointed team leader, and it is not long before things start to fall apart

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Maggie becomes obsessed with unlikely babysitter Moe - much to the dismay of Marge and Homer, who think he is an unsuitable role model and ban him from seeing her again

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge walks out on Homer for allowing an adult film to be shot in their house, and begins a new life - protecting endangered aquatic creatures alongside good-looking marine biologist Caleb Thorn. Featuring the guest voice of Alec Baldwin

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Girl Who Slept Too Little
programme.desc: A construction project causes the local graveyard to be moved next to the familys home - to the dismay of Lisa, who is so concerned by the development she begins to suffer nightmares. She eventually decides the best way to conquer her fear is by facing it head on and spending a night at the cemetery

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: A rolling cast of famous faces, including Nick and Liv Grimshaw, Rylan and his mum Linda, Shaun Ryder and Bez, Micah Richards and Jamie Carragher, Martin and Roman Kemp, Mo Gilligan and Babatunde Aleshe and Mel C and her brother Paul, appraise shows including appraise Love Island, Alan Carrs Epic Gameshow: Celebrity Special, Fifty Shades of Grey, The Bridge: Race to a Fortune and Spooked Scotland. First shown in June 2022

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including Squid Game: The Challenge, The Couple Next Door, Strictly Come Dancing, The Graham Norton Show, Planet Earth III, Matt Baker: Travels with Mum and Dad and Jingle All the Way. From December 2023

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on the revamped Gladiators, get loved up with First Dates: Be My Valentine, and give their unmissable takes on the movie Saltburn. Plus: Trigger Point, Bring the Drama, The Repair Shop, This Morning and BBC News coverage of President Joe Biden. First shown in February 2024

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Ladies man Terry returns to the restaurant to find love, hoping it will be third time lucky, Canadian-born Donato plans to win over Londoner Kate with his transatlantic charms, and Rajans bold dating techniques may leave him without a second date on the cards. Meanwhile, 50-year-old Ed, who hasnt had much success so far, hopes Dawn will be the woman of his dreams

programme.title: Celebrity First Dates
programme.desc: TV presenter Esther Rantzen has found life lonely since the death of her husband Desmond Wilcox in 2000, but is worried her formidable reputation can scare men off. She participates in this celebrity version of the show in which singletons meet up with potential partners at a restaurant. Also appearing on this first edition are actor Richard Blackwood (aka EastEnders bad boy Vincent), The Only Way Is Essex reality TV star Jess Wright and 2012 Paralympics table tennis silver medallist Will Bayley

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including Squid Game: The Challenge, The Couple Next Door, Strictly Come Dancing, The Graham Norton Show, Planet Earth III, Matt Baker: Travels with Mum and Dad and Jingle All the Way. From December 2023

programme.title: Made in Chelsea
programme.desc: Livvy seems intent on moving on as she goes on her first date with Kit, and Jack asks Jules flatmate Maddison on a date. Arman has got both Tabitha and Yas back on side, but the DJ seems to be playing a dangerous game. Meanwhile, Jazz confides in Jules and Jack that Demi has said she doesnt trust her. Alice and Sam Vanderpump have some big news to break to their friends

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: The chef heads to floundering soul food restaurant Blackberrys in Plainfield, New Jersey, but struggles to get his message across to indomitable owner Shelley. Her refusal to deal with the truth comes to a head when Gordon finds a dead mouse in the doorway, prompting him to step up his efforts to change her ways

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is hurt when Professor Proton contacts Leonard for help, so he befriends TV scientist Bill Nye, and Raj gets jealous when Howard crashes a girls night in making home-made jewellery. Guest starring Bob Newhart, with Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki, and Kunal Nayyar

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Adventurer Simon Reeve sets out to travel around the coastline of the Indian Ocean, journeying by boat, car, train and plane as he takes in 16 countries. He starts on the tip of South Africa, where he dives with ragged-tooth sharks and joins conservationists helping to save the endangered African penguin, before heading into Cape Town, where he has a close encounter with a drug dealer. Moving on, he hitches a boat to Mozambique, where a nervous captain reveals the threat posed by Somali pirates, and completes this leg of his journey in Zanzibar, a tropical island steeped in the long history of the slave trade

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The adventurers epic journey continues on the coast of Madagascar, where he goes spearfishing with the Vezo people, whose lifestyle is under threat from their own rapid population growth. On Mauritius, he visits slums that show a different side to the tourist paradise, and he ends this leg in the Seychelles, meeting an Englishman who is turning his private island into the worlds smallest national park. Simon also joins the Dutch Special Forces, training to board pirate ships operating on the high seas

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The third leg of the adventurers journey takes him from the south of Kenya to the Horn of Africa. Along the way he joins a Ugandan peace-keeping force in Mogadishu, the capital of war-torn Somalia, which turns out to be the most dangerous leg of his journey as he ends up under fire on the front line. In contrast, he finds neighbouring Somaliland a stable and democratic home to thousands of Somalis fleeing fighting and famine. In Kenyas Tana Delta, he meets villagers facing eviction from an area that the government is turning over to sugar cane production for bio-fuels

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The fourth leg of the adventurers journey takes him from Oman to the Maldives. He starts in the Strait of Hormuz, where oil from the Gulf is shipped through the narrow channel, then moves on to Mumbai, the oceans biggest port. In the Maldives, Simon finds arguably the most beautiful collection of tropical coral islands in the world - but the fragile underwater environment is a barometer for the changing nature of the sea, as he witnesses how bleaching has damaged the coral and an entire island has been manufactured as a landfill dump to deal with the problem of rubbish

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo reaches London on his rail journey from Warwick to Rye in East Sussex. In Ealing, he is transformed for the silver screen by expert hair and make-up, before travelling to Fulham, where he heads underground to explore Londons new super sewer. Then, Michael visits the London School of Economics and Political Science in central London, before finally arriving in Kensington

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo falls into line with the University of Glasgows Officer Training Corps, where he joins students for drill. The political pundit then heads west along the Firth of Clyde to Helensburgh, where he discovers a pioneering group of artists known as the Glasgow Boys. The idyllic West Highland Line takes Michael deep into the Highlands to Inveraray and the ancestral home of the Clan Campbell and Dukes of Argyll. Michaels final stop is Connel Ferry, near Oban, where, on the Achnacloich Estate, he discovers a Highland calf whose breed has become an icon of the Highlands

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his early 20th century Bradshaws Guide, Michael Portillo sets off on the first leg of a trip through Britains industrial heartlands in the footsteps of George V, beginning by travelling from Warrington to Preston

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels from Belfast to Portrush, he investigates the work of author and Narnia creator CS Lewis and learns how religion influenced Lewiss work. Michael also visits the Royal Portrush Golf Club to find out how Irelands female population dominated the fairways at the time of his guide

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In Blackburn, Michael Portillo catches a rare glimpse of Edwardian life on celluloid and marvels at how factory workers and schoolchildren alike were drawn to seek fame on film. Continuing east to Nelson, Michael braves the enemy camp to have a pint of tea with the socialist working classes in Britains last Clarion House

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets off on the first leg of a journey from the Midlands to Rye in East Sussex. At Cowley, he marvels at an automated state-of-the-art production line that produces 1,000 Minis a day. Michael probes the pre-First World War origins of the Morris Oxford and is delighted to find that cars for export are loaded in Italian Job style on to trains at the factorys own railhead

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo sets off on the first leg of a journey across Northern Ireland to Argyll and Bute. Beginning in Newry, he finds a specially chartered train that would deliver demonstrators campaigning for Irish Home Rule to a rally in the town. On the border between Northern Ireland and the Republic at Glaslough, Michael discovers a christening robe belonging to Sir Winston Churchill

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: The naturalist investigates whether animals and plants have developed an awareness of mathematics, including bamboos that flower exactly the same around the world. Plus, the story of a German horse named Hans that was declared a mathematical genius, but all was not as it seemed

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: The veteran naturalist investigates two shells that have proved to be winners in evolution - the birds egg shell and the hard shell of the tortoise. The ostrich egg is so strong it is possible for it to take a persons weight without breaking - so how does a chick manage break out of such a fortress? The evolution of the tortoise shell was for a long time a mystery, and this bony box offers a lot more than just protection

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: The evolutionary documentary concludes, as David Attenborough profiles the Siamese fighting fish, so aggressive it will fight its own reflection until it is exhausted. He also looks at the kangaroo - once pitted against humans in the boxing ring - which has a kick so strong it can kill

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores natures evolutionary anomalies and examines two creatures whose stretched features have given them an edge in the natural world. The chameleon has an extra-long tongue that helps it catch prey and the giraffes neck is so long it is easily able to reach the tops of trees for food

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough highlights the curiosities that have led to accusations of forgery, but have ultimately helped assist the rethinking of evolution. When early explorers brought the first specimen of a duck-billed platypus to England in 1799, it was considered so bizarre it was deemed a hoax. Similarly, the midwife toad became the centre of a scientific storm in the 1920s that led to accusations of fakery

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough encounters two species with wrinkly skin, where nature has tinkered with the ageing process to different effect. The mole rat retains its looks while growing old and the elephant looks old from birth, yet both creatures live relatively long lives

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attend questions why spirals are so widespread in nature. He gleans some answers by examining the narwhals tusk and the spiral shells found on snails and ammonites, as he continues to discover natures evolutionary anomalies

programme.title: David Attenboroughs Natural Curiosities
programme.desc: David Attenborough examines a zebras stripes and the wings of a butterfly, as he continues to discover natures evolutionary anomalies

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Yorkie volunteers to do some work at a youth club, a decision he soon has cause to regret

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Yorkie ends up in hospital after becoming involved in a traffic accident that leaves several people dead

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: CID officers organise a stakeout to trap a burglar who has escaped from custody

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Human remains are discovered in a flat, but the occupants are nowhere to be found

programme.title: The Bill
programme.desc: Ramsey finds a newborn baby in a skip and tries to trace the infants mother

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: Felix and Tony run a tramp steamer together in the West Indies, but their seemingly unshakeable friendship is tossed aside when they both fall in love with the same woman. Tony tries to undermine his rival by exposing his illegal activities, while Felix responds with deadly intent. Romantic drama, starring Rita Hayworth, Robert Mitchum and Jack Lemmon.

programme.title: The Moonraker
programme.desc: A foppish royalist nobleman leads a double life as a Roundhead-baiting highwayman. However, after Cromwells final victory at the battle of Worcester, the dashing hero has to smuggle the son of Charles I to safety in France. Swashbuckling adventure, starring George Baker, Sylvia Syms, Marius Goring, John Le Mesurier and Patrick Troughton

programme.title: Saraband for Dead Lovers
programme.desc: A woman trapped in a loveless marriage to the future king of England falls for an aristocrat romantically linked to a possessive countess. Period drama, starring Stewart Granger, Joan Greenwood, Francoise Rosay and Flora Robson

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: A Second World War naval officer is given the command of an old sailing ship to undertake a very important mission - to transport an Australian agent into enemy waters so he can spy on the Japanese. However, he finds the ship is falling apart at the seams and is manned by a crew that does not know how to sail her. Comedy, starring Jack Lemmon, Ricky Nelson, John Lund, Chips Rafferty and Tom Tully

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: US Army Ranger Briggs is determined to regain his place at Joint Base Lewis-McChord in Washington. His superior officer agrees to return him to the fold if he can successfully escort a military working dog named Lulu along Americas Pacific Coast to attend the funeral of her handler. Comedy, co-directed by and starring Channing Tatum

programme.title: Dejà Vu
programme.desc: A federal agent investigating the bombing of a ferryboat in New Orleans is given access by the government to a top-secret device that allows him to see into the past. He focuses on one victim in particular, a woman whom he believes holds the key to the crime, and becomes convinced that he can prevent the explosion ever happening. Sci-fi thriller, with Denzel Washington, Paula Patton, Val Kilmer and Jim Caviezel

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: A former US government operative battling with an addiction to alcohol is hired as a bodyguard to the nine-year-old daughter of a wealthy businessman in Mexico City. When the girl is abducted, he swears vengeance on those responsible while setting out on a dangerous, revenge-fuelled rescue mission. Action thriller, starring Denzel Washington, Christopher Walken, Radha Mitchell and Dakota Fanning

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: A motorist travelling by night with his girlfriend nearly crashes into a van on the M1, and as it drives off he sees a badly beaten woman tied up in the back. Stopping at a service station, he panics when his girlfriend disappears and becomes convinced the van driver has abducted her as well. Thriller, starring William Ash, Christine Bottomley and Andreas Wisniewski

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: An ordinary teenager is recruited by a mystical martial arts master for a vitally important quest. He must find seven magical spheres before they fall into the hands of an evil warlord, who intends to use their power to let him take over the world. Fantasy adventure based on the Japanese cartoon series, starring Justin Chatwin, Chow Yun-Fat and James Marsters

programme.title: Babys Day Out
programme.desc: Three bungling kidnappers hatch a plan to pose as society reporters and snatch the baby son of a wealthy couple. However, the infant escapes on to the streets of New York, evading the crooks every attempt to recapture him. Comedy, starring Joe Mantegna, Lara Flynn Boyle, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: A teenager discovers he is the last in a long line of warriors destined to defend the world from dark forces. His duty now is to embark on a perilous journey through time to recover the six parts of a powerful mystical artefact and ensure it is returned to safe hands. Fantasy adventure, starring Alexander Ludwig, Christopher Eccleston and Ian McShane

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: After being bitten by a radioactive arachnid, student Miles Morales develops incredible abilities, and becomes a version of Spider-Man. When a super collider device opens a gateway to other dimensions, Miles crosses paths with five counterparts to stop a threat for all realities. Oscar-winning animated adventure, with the voices of Shameik Moore and Nicolas Cage

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: An ageing assassin is targeted by a mysterious young operative that seems able to anticipate his every move. Discovering that hes being hunted by a younger clone of himself, Henry needs to find out why hes being targeted and who the creator is. Action drama, starring Will Smith, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Clive Owen

Space age pilot Mills suffers a catastrophic mechanical failure at the controls of his craft and crash-lands on a mysterious planet. Armed with limited munitions, he deduces that he is stranded on Earth 65 million years ago when dinosaurs ruled the third rock from the sun. Action adventure, starring Adam Driver and Ariana Greenblatt

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: In 1970s North Denver, a masked predator nicknamed The Grabber poses as a magician to lure unsuspecting children into the back of his van. Five youngsters vanish without trace despite the best efforts of Detectives Wright and Miller to identify a prime suspect. Their enquiries lead to Gwen Shaw, an abused girl who claims to have prophetic dreams about the missing boys. Horror, starring Mason Thames, Ethan Hawke, Madeleine McGraw and Jeremy Davies

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl is murdered by her neighbour and finds herself in an afterlife drawn from her own subconscious. She watches over her family, as her parents struggle to cope in the face of their loss and her sister seeks to identify the killer - who, having covered his tracks, is preparing to strike again. Peter Jacksons fantasy drama, starring Saoirse Ronan, Rachel Weisz, Mark Wahlberg, Stanley Tucci and Susan Sarandon

programme.title: Fort Ti
programme.desc: As war is raging across 18th-century colonial America, a band of famed native fighters join British forces for an assault on a French stronghold. Western, originally filmed in 3-D, starring George Montgomery and Joan Vohs

programme.title: This Week Back Then
programme.desc: How news bulletins used to look. The GREAT! network takes viewers back in time, remembering stories from this week back then

programme.title: Fort Ti
programme.desc: As war is raging across 18th-century colonial America, a band of famed native fighters join British forces for an assault on a French stronghold. Western, originally filmed in 3-D, starring George Montgomery and Joan Vohs

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Clay tries to clear illiterate Kansas Joe Barton, recently released from jail, of threatening to kill Territorial Governor Armstrong when he arrives in Tombstone

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Hollister captures a bank robber in the desert. Its a 20-mile walk back to Tombstone with the rest of the bank robbers gang hot on his trail

programme.title: The Way West
programme.desc: A senator and a veteran scout lead a band of settlers on an arduous journey across the great plains of 19th-century America. However, they face the prospect of reprisals from Native Americans when one of the pioneers accidentally shoots a child. Western, starring Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum, Lola Albright, Michael Witney, Richard Widmark and Sally Field in her big-screen debut

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh brings a wanted man in to the Mesa City Sheriff, only to find he killed the sheriffs brother. Josh decides to join the sheriff and prisoner on the trip to take the man to Crazy Horse for trial but along the way the man escapes

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: The Siesta Killer leaves a trail of bodies across the Southwest, striking when everyones resting from the afternoon heat. Hollister investigates with the help of an insurance man

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Clay tries to clear illiterate Kansas Joe Barton, recently released from jail, of threatening to kill Territorial Governor Armstrong when he arrives in Tombstone

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.sub-title: The New Lion of Sonora - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. After the death of Don Sebastion, his ranch is willed to his brother whose only concern is gambling, women, drinking and having a good time. Manolito, who didnt desire the property, tries to convince his uncle to save the ranch, and to also work with Big John

programme.title: The Persuaders!
programme.desc: A murder in a country wood, a beautiful woman and a sensational political drama create excitement for Danny and Brett. Adventure series, starring Tony Curtis and Roger Moore

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: The duo investigate the strange deaths of several astronomers whose bodies have been mysteriously bleached white, and encounter an eccentric society dedicated to establishing contact with aliens from Venus. Jon Pertwee guest stars in the series first colour episode

programme.title: The New Avengers
programme.desc: Steed, Purdey and Gambit investigate the death of a colleague on a remote Scottish island, and suspicious monks appear to be hiding some treasure. Patrick Macnee, Joanna Lumley and Gareth Hunt star

programme.title: Lone Wolf McQuade
programme.desc: A maverick Texas Ranger antagonises his superiors by using unorthodox methods to smash a major criminal operation. Action thriller, starring Chuck Norris, David Carradine, Barbara Carrera, Leon Isaac Kennedy and RG Armstrong

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Hollister is captured near the Lucky Mule Mine by three escaped convicts, who are trying to decide who is going to kill him. To survive with no guns, hell have to rely on his wits

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: Victoria and Wind go to a bank in Tucson, but get caught up in a hostage situation when a gang tries to steal a shipment of army money

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A spaceship crash-lands on a mysterious planet where humans are mute creatures who find themselves at the mercy of intelligent apes. The worlds simian rulers are horrified when one of the crew reveals he can speak and plan to have him killed, but two chimpanzee scientists intervene, determined to learn from the new arrival. Sci-fi drama, starring Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter and Maurice Evans

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: As a 7,000-strong Mexican army sweeps across Texas, Colonel William Travis is given the task of drawing the invading forces with a desperate last stand using a small force of volunteers at the Alamo Mission in San Antonio, giving his superior officers time to assemble their counter-attack. Western based on the historical battle, directed by and starring John Wayne. With Richard Widmark and Laurence Harvey

programme.title: The Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: The maid of honour at a pending wedding has little faith in a supposedly charmed cottage which makes people fall in love, until she meets the grooms brother. Romantic comedy, starring Merritt Patterson, Steve Lund and Brittney Wilson

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: Kylie, a struggling pastry chef, discovers she has secured a place in the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition. Spotting a chance to raise her profile - and perhaps jumpstart business at her new cafe - she enters, but her chances of winning are quickly slashed when her oven breaks down right before the contest. Determined to remain in the running, she appeals to her old boyfriend Nick, who gave up his education to take over his family pizzeria. He agrees to let her use his kitchens industrial ovens to craft her gingerbread delicacies, and as they pair work together, a familiar spark rekindles their old flame. Festive romance, starring Lacey Chabert and Lea Coco

programme.title: On the Twelfth Day of Christmas
programme.desc: Maggie is thrilled when Mitch, her long-time crush, has moved back to their home town. However, his previously abundant enthusiasm for Christmas has drastically diminished, and she tries to restore him to his old self by helping him see the magic of the festive season. Romantic drama, starring Brooke Nevin and Robin Dunne

programme.title: A Family for the Holidays
programme.desc: After arriving in town two years ago in search of the truth about her parentage, Miranda Chester (last seen in Engaging Father Christmas) now prepares to marry the love of her life. Romantic mystery, starring Erin Krakow and Niall Matter

programme.title: A Christmas Break
programme.desc: Teacher Addison Tate hopes for a festive miracle as officials decide to close her school. Romantic drama, starring Cindy Sampson and Steve Byers

programme.title: Christmas Joy
programme.desc: Market researcher Joy is about to receive a deserved promotion just in time for the holidays. However, she also gets an urgent phone call from home and rushes back to help her aunt recover from surgery. This visit reunites her with former crush, Ben. Romantic drama, starring Danielle Panabaker and Matt Long

programme.title: Christmas on Mistletoe Lake
programme.desc: An interior designer who finds herself in the town of Mistletoe Lake at Christmas helps a local man renovate a boat. Festive romance, starring Genelle Williams

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Jessica persuades Seth to visit his estranged brother, who promptly turns up dead. The sleuth must uncover whether he was killed by a curse supposedly placed on a stolen Indian pendant, which a diplomat is determined to see returned to its own country. Angela Lansbury stars

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: Carrie is forced to confront her painful past when Dr Eugene Lustig, a prominent researcher who helped her understand her condition, is found dead - having fallen from a 12-storey building. A recent conflict puts his disgruntled assistant at the top of the suspect list - until he too is killed - and a search of the latest victims apartment uncovers a box of tapes from one of Lustigs studies, some of which include footage of Carrie. A cassette is missing, however, and its significance could be the key to cracking the case

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Part one of two. The duo team up with experienced FBI agent Jordan Shaw in the hunt for a serial killer with an apparent obsession for Nikki Heat, the character Castle based on Beckett in his best-seller Heat Wave. Aided by some hi-tech gadgetry, Shaw soon finds partial fingerprint matches at the two crime scenes that lead to a man currently on parole for manslaughter. But it seems the suspect made a peculiar deal on the internet with an anonymous source. Guest starring Dana Delany (Body of Proof)

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Mums the Word
programme.desc: An ex-lawyer returns to her home town to start again as a florist, but then a thorny murder mystery arises. Whodunnit, starring Brooke Shields and Brennan Elliott

programme.desc: Part two of two. programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Jackie prosecutes her mothers friend for negligence in the workplace, and Blaketon expresses his disapproval of Bellamys relationship with Gina in no uncertain terms. programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: An aristocrats wealthy, overbearing wife finances a North African archaeological dig to find the skull of John the Baptist. Poirot is in attendance, but when the woman is found stabbed to death, and only her husband, the exuberant Lord Boynton, appears distraught, the detective struggles to identify the killer among the wealth of suspects. Guest starring Tim Curry, Cheryl Campbell, John Hannah, Emma Cunniffe, Mark Gatiss, Angela Pleasence and Beth Goddard, with David Suchet in the title role

Whodunit, starring Jack Shepherd and Helen Masters

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: A young woman asks Poirot to investigate her fathers murder - a 14-year-old crime for which her mother was found guilty and executed. The detective agrees to investigate, but warns his client that he may discover things she does not want to hear. David Suchet stars, with Rachael Stirling, Aidan Gillen, Aimee Mullens, Toby Stephens, Gemma Jones, Patrick Malahide and Annette Badland

programme.desc: The detective investigates a double poisoning, aiming to prove the innocence of Elinor Carlisle, the chief suspect in the deaths of her aunt and her rival in love. However, it emerges that she is the only person with a motive, opportunity and means to administer the poison. Crime drama, starring David Suchet, Elisabeth Dermot-Walsh, Diana Quick, Paul McGann and Rupert Penry-Jones

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: The dapper Belgian sleuth goes on an Egyptian cruise on board an old steamer, but when an American heiress is murdered, his little grey cells go into overdrive. On questioning each of his fellow passengers, he realises many of them have secrets they want to remain hidden. David Suchet stars, with James Fox, Judy Parfitt, Emily Blunt, Daisy Donovan, Frances de la Tour and David Soul

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.desc: A philandering husband is found dying by the swimming pool after being shot during a house party at the home of Lady Lucy Angkatell. Legendary Belgian Sleuth Poirot, who is guest of honour at the gathering, appears to have an open-and-shut case on his hands - but the investigator finds himself up against one of his finest adversaries. Whodunit, guest-starring Sarah Miles (Ryans Daughter), with David Suchet, Lysette Anthony and Edward Fox

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Each year, the Midsomer village of Angels Rise hosts an annual psychic fayre in the vast and gothic Eddon Hall. Founded by the Saint-Stephens family in memory of their late daughter, the event attracts all manner of mediums, psychics and followers of the occult. When a body is found surrounded by ritual symbols on the eve of the gathering, Barnaby must step into a world of self-proclaimed witches to find the killer. Crime drama, starring Neil Dudgeon, with Tracy-Ann Oberman and Colin Salmon

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: A body is found buried on the Northumberland moors which could be a missing teenager from the nearby rural community of Brindale. The girl had disappeared six weeks previously, and Vera has to break the news to her devastated family. However, the realisation that she died so close to home rather than at a music festival as originally thought creates tension among her neighbours, who are soon suspecting each other of murder. The detective delves into the vulnerable young womans isolated existence to identify her killer

programme.title: Agatha Christies Poirot
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of the Blue Train
programme.desc: The sleuth finds himself in interesting company as English socialites and American millionaires rub shoulders on board a train bound for the French Riviera. Passengers include oil magnate Rufus Van Aldin (Elliott Gould) and his daughter Ruth (Jaime Murray) - to whom he has given a magnificent ruby known as the Heart of Fire. With members of the aristocracy crammed into a confined space with their husbands, lovers and a renowned gemstone, murder cannot be far away. With Lindsay Duncan, Roger Lloyd Pack and James DArcy

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell meet Sara Hathaway who, after losing her adoptive mother and older brother in the space of just a year, is desperate to find her birth family. Plus, Diane Kerridge shares her story of being forced to give up the child she gave birth to as a teenager in the 1960s. Over 50 years later, she is hoping to find her long lost son

programme.desc: When Christopher Greens body is left in a ditch less than a mile from his house, investigators only hope of solving his murder are shoeprints at the scene and neighbourly intel.

programme.title: Storm of Suspicion
programme.desc: On a blustery day in Michigan, police receive a call reporting that a beloved couple were found dead in their home. There are few clues, but snow on the ground offers a key lead.

programme.desc: The Judge advises a mother to spend more time on a custody battle than a fight over an alleged small loan to the grandmother of her children.

programme.title: Facing Evil
programme.desc: The murders of Twila Busby and her two adult sons in their Texas home on New Years Eve 1993. She had been bludgeoned and they had been stabbed. Her live-in boyfriend Hank Skinner was later found guilty, but insisted his innocence

programme.title: Money for Nothing

She then tries to cultivate something sellable from some ancient rotovator blades

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Raj Bisram and Irita Marriott delight in Devonshire, where cream teas and antique treasures are on the menu. Amid the local ships, the pair dig up some wooden toys, prized pottery and very shiny things to sell. Irita visits an antiques emporium thats so new, it hasnt even opened yet and also gets her hands on something that brings back happy memories of childhood. Raj, meanwhile, heads off to hear the story of one of the great adventurers of the 20th century, as told by the son of the great man himself

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Raj Bisram and Irita Marriott embrace their inner pirate as they plunder the shops of the Cornish peninsula. Raj makes some big finds in one of the tiniest shops of the trip and pins his hopes on a risky item that may or may not be highly collectable. Irita plumps for a very cheap purchase and finds a painting that reminds her of her childhood and also contains a hidden secret. Along the way theres still time for some sightseeing, kite-flying and, of course, pirate impressions. The pair then head to the final auction to see who will emerge victorious

programme.title: The Derbyshire Auction House
programme.desc: Unique Ottoman silver, piles of German silver, a Chinese silver tea set, and a designer silver pendant, sell for incredible sums under Iritas gavel

programme.title: The Derbyshire Auction House
programme.desc: Irita helps a woman reluctant to part with her late parents incredible antique collection, before getting a big surprise in a small bungalow

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp and Philip Serrell continue seeking items of value, on a tour of East Ayrshire and Dumfries and Galloway. Natasha picks up a silver tea caddy and a first edition Virginia Woolf collection of books. Philip discovers just why collecting ancient musical instruments was a status symbol in the 19th century. He also finds a beautiful watercolour by a local artist, but is distracted by some very tasty looking homemade scones

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp and Phil Serrell go shopping for items of interest in Northern Ireland. Natasha is dazzled by the sight of a bright pink Majolica lotus pattern tea service and the sounds of the Irish fiddle. She even gets a mini masterclass on how to play this centuries-old instrument of the Emerald Isle. Philip is feeling the pinch and is desperate to find some profit-making antiques. He scoops up an old bowler hat, a pair of early dumbbells and a mid-19th-century worktable that reminds him of his grandmother. The duo later head to their final auction in Wales, where an unexpected bidding frenzy ensues

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Alex Polizzi headss to the Dukes in the Bedfordshire village of Heath and Reach to help mum-of-two Sarah to improve the pub she bought three years ago. After a successful first year, a personal setback turned Sarahs dream into a nightmare. With a knock to her confidence and her eye off the ball, occupancy took a nosedive and the business has bombed. Alex arrives to find Sarah hiding from customers in the kitchen, staff kicking their heels and the place looking more like a youth club than a character country pub

programme.title: The Hotel Inspector
programme.desc: Berkshire beckons as Alex Polizzi is called to the Grenfell Arms in Maidenhead, a pub with eight bedrooms and a restaurant, all run by 31-year-old Jamie. Muireann revamps a classic with accompaniment from renowned local musician Donal OConnor and the acclaimed post-punk band Gurriers perform their new release Erasure.
