Maggie arranges a place for Rachel at Cloisters, and although she is at first reluctant, she eventually agrees. As Anna waits for updates, the weight of uncertainty begins to settle in and she struggles to find the strength to face what lies ahead

programme.title: Five Minutes of Heaven
programme.desc: In Lurgan, Co Armagh, 19-year-old Catholic Jim Griffin is killed by 17-year-old Ulster Volunteer Force member Alistair Little during the Troubles of 1975. Griffins murder is witnessed by his younger brother, Joe, who is left traumatised as a result. Years later, a reconciliation project is set up, bringing Joe Griffin into contact with Little, who has served a 12-year prison sentence. While the justice system might believe Little has paid for his crime, Griffin thinks otherwise, and heads to the rendezvous with murder in mind. Fact-based drama, based on the real-life killing of Jim Griffin, with the modern day encounter serving as a fictional epilogue to the incident. James Nesbitt, Liam Neeson, Anamaria Marinca and Mark Davison star

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby
programme.desc: Monica Galetti and Rob Rinder head to the snowy Alps and the little-known Hotel Hubertus - a resort in the Tyrol region of northern Italy thats the vision of one family. Their hotel gives spectacular views of the mountains due to its creative architecture that features dramatic angles and levitating pools and saunas. The Gasser family run this hotel and also have links to the world-class ski resort above it - all bringing valuable income into the community. Rob and Monica work behind the scenes in the unique Heaven and Hell spa, cleaning the suspended pool, lead mountain treks and get to know the family behind the vision

Family comedy based on Beatrix Potters stories, starring Domhnall Gleeson and Rose Byrne, with the voices of James Corden and Margot Robbie

programme.desc: A ruthless criminal and his gang hijack a crowded New York subway train and demand a $1million ransom, threatening to shoot a passenger every minute after the deadline expires. As the deadline looms, a transit police detective struggles to cut through City Hall red tape and negotiate the safe release of the innocent people on board. Thriller, starring Walter Matthau, Robert Shaw, Martin Balsam, Hector Elizondo, Earl Hindman and James Broderick

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Following an altercation with his housemates, Alfie - an Italian immigrant and one of the residents at Leonards halfway house - is found dead. The murder has been made to look like suicide, but Geordie realises that Alfie has been murdered and that the residents are the only suspects - the neighbours are appalled and Leonard comes under pressure to close the place down even as the police inquiry gets under way, and Will feels guilty that he didnt listen to the victim. Drama set in the 1950s, starring Robson Green

The others are a pared-back barn conversion that neatly sidesteps the pitfalls of restoring agricultural buildings and a Japanese-inspired house that proves a standard budget need not be an obstacle to building a bespoke home

programme.desc: Michael Portillo travels along the eastern coast of Australia from the coal mines of Newcastle, New South Wales, to Queenslands modern state capital, Brisbane. In the worlds largest coal-exporting port, Michael marvels at the skill of the loader as he transfers thousands of tons of coal from rail to ship. He visits the Koala Hospital at Port Macquarie, where he finds populations of these marsupials are in rapid decline. Michael also visits a factory where the quintessential Australian bush hat is made and in Woolgoolga, he joins a Sikh community to hear how they have integrated into Australian society

The episode also features the mating dances of mobula rays and the symbiotic relationship between Columbus crabs and turtles

The Republic have made a disappointing start to their campaign, drawing at home to Hungary before losing 2-1 away to Armenia, and how face a tough test against the group favourites, who won both of their opening contests. Fantasy drama, starring Emilia Clarke, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Kit Harrington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In Kings Landing, Cersei and Tywin plot the next move for the Lannisters and the Crown after Tommens coronation, while Ser Jorah gives Daenerys worrying news about the situations in Yunkai and Astapor. Jon and his band of volunteers mount a raid on the mutineers at Crasters Keep, and Sansa and Littlefinger arrive at the Eyrie. Fantasy drama, starring Lena Headey, Charles Dance, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: The Laws of Gods and Men
programme.desc: Stannis and Davos arrive in Braavos for their meeting with the Iron Bank, but find Tycho Nestoris (Mark Gatiss) a hard man to do business with. Yara Greyjoy leads a band of Ironborn on a mission to rescue her brother Theon, while Daenerys meets with supplicants in Meereen. In Kings Landing, Tyrions trial begins in the throne room and he is stunned by the identity of one of the crowns witnesses. Fantasy drama, starring Stephen Dillane and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrion enlists an unlikely ally, while Daario entreats Daenerys to allow him to do what he does best. Jons warnings about the Walls vulnerability fall on deaf ears, while Brienne and Pod follow a new lead as they continues their mission to track down the Stark girls. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Tyrions fate is decided as his champion Oberyn Martell faces against Gregor the Mountain Clegane in his trial by combat, while Moles Town is on the receiving end of a raid by the wildlings. Ramsay sends Theon into Moat Cailin to negotiate the surrender of the Ironborn troops holding the fort, Littlefinger and Sansa are questioned about the circumstances surrounding Lysas death and Barristan confronts Jorah about a document delivered to him. Fantasy drama, starring Peter Dinklage and Pedro Pascal

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The men of the Nights Watch face their biggest challenge yet as they prepare to defend the Wall and Castle Black against attacks from the north and south by Mance Rayders wildling army, with Ygritte determined to be the one to kill Jon Snow. Sam gets some sage advice about love from Maester Aemon and is shocked when someone comes knocking at the gates seeking shelter. Fantasy drama, starring Kit Harington and directed by Neil Marshall, the man behind the second series episode depicting the Battle of the Blackwater

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Jon Snow heads into the wildling camp to try to negotiate a peace with Mance Rayder, but an unexpected arrival changes the situation at the Wall, while Daenerys is forced to make a decision about the dragons in Meereen. Cersei demands that Tywin call off her engagement to Loras Tyrell, Bran learns more about his destiny, and Tyrion receives a visit from Jaime as he awaits his fate. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martins A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Peter Dinklage and Emilia Clarke

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The fate of Jon Snow is revealed, Ramsay sends his dogs after Theon and Sansa, while Ellaria and the Sand Snakes make their move

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: Bran trains with the Three-Eyed Raven, while in the north of Westeros at Castle Black, the Nights Watch stands behind Alliser Thorne. Fantasy drama, starring Isaac Hempstead-Wright and Owen Teale

programme.title: The White Lotus
programme.desc: In the wake of the festivities, Laurie finds herself feeling deceived by Jaclyn, while Saxon tries to bury what happened the night before

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: A nasty remark about his wife sets a livid Johnny on a personal vendetta, Meadow considers volunteer work at a law centre and Furio throws a big house-warming party. Meanwhile, Tony and Carmela fall out over money and a veteran hitman receives an offer from Silvio and Christopher

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Adriana finds Christophers business becoming increasingly noticeable at her club and Tony pays a visit to the track to check out Ralphs new horse. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini, Michael Imperioli and Joe Pantoliano

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Artie Bucco agrees to lend money to his new hostesss brother for an overseas business venture - but when things do not go to plan, he finds himself in a desperate situation. Carmela arranges a date for Furio with an oral hygienist, Christopher takes on new responsibilities and Tony receives disturbing news about his ex-mistress

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: The family throw Paulie a party as he is released from jail, Tony and Ralph ignore sensible financial advice and Adriana decides to get married before it is too late. Tony Sirico stars

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Furio takes a trip to his native Italy to visit his ailing father, while Paulie makes brave attempts to integrate his mother into Green Groves social world. Carmela explores a possible new source of investment and Ralph cannot wait to see Tony - but only so he can show off his new girlfriend Valentina

programme.title: In Treatment
programme.desc: Alex recounts one of his most recent dreams, and Paul attempts to work out its hidden meaning. Gabriel Byrne and Blair Underwood star

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: August arrives and the fishermen of Brixham spend time ashore with their families as their boats are repaired - but summer proves costly for Jan, who loses £1,000 for every day his vessel is out of action. Apprentice deckhand Logan has to decide whether a life at sea is the right choice for him and his family, and seafood seller Jenny receives a surprise on her 65th birthday

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: A battle-hardened special forces operative attempts to rescue his kidnapped niece when a mercenary mission spirals into chaos. Action thriller, starring Eden Brolin, Andy Garcia and Melissa Leo

programme.title: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace
programme.desc: The Man of Steel embarks on a mission to destroy every nuclear weapon on the planet. However, his arch-enemy Lex Luthor sees the chance to rid himself of the superhero by creating a deadly radioactive henchman who causes havoc around the world. Comic-book adventure sequel, starring Christopher Reeve, Gene Hackman, Mark Pillow and Margot Kidder

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Steve Vail is reactivated when an extortionist targets the agency. Director Renny Harlins thriller based on the Noah Boyd novel, starring Aaron Eckhart, Nina Dobrev and Clifton Collins Jr

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravennas wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Conservationist Sergei Kravinoffs complex relationship with his ruthless father, Nikolai, sets him on a path of vengeance with brutal consequences, motivating him to become Kraven, the worlds most feared hunter. Fantasy adventure, starring Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Russell Crowe and Ariana Debose

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Economic unrest ensues after King Leopold cuts off access to the Belgian Congo, so years after leaving his old home behind, Tarzan is lured back from Victorian England hoping to stabilise matters. However, he soon finds he has been lured into a deadly trap orchestrated by one of Leopolds envoys. Adventure, starring Alexander Skarsgard, Margot Robbie and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriends blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Retired soldier Benjamin Martin, who turned his back on the military to become a farmer in South Carolina, takes up arms once more to avenge the unprovoked murder of his son at the hands of the British during the American War of Independence. As he seeks vengeance, he finds himself up against a sadistic officer wreaking havoc in the surrounding area. Roland Emmerichs action adventure, starring Mel Gibson, Jason Isaacs, Heath Ledger and Joely Richardson.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: A cop is murdered in the line of duty by his crooked partner, and ends up recruited by a supernatural police force. Teaming up with a Wild West lawman, he is sent back to Earth to prevent ghosts from causing chaos and uncovers a plot to overrun the land of the living with evil spirits. Fantasy adventure, with Ryan Reynolds and Jeff Bridges

programme.title: Long Gone Heroes
programme.desc: A battle-hardened special forces operative attempts to rescue his kidnapped niece when a mercenary mission spirals into chaos. Action thriller, starring Eden Brolin, Andy Garcia and Melissa Leo

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From Dirty Harry and The Godfather to the deeply imperfect gang from the Fast and the Furious franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: The underwater kingdom of Atlantiss fate hangs in the balance when ruthless mercenary David Kane, aka Black Manta, attempts to avenge his fathers death at the hands of Aquaman by wielding a mythical trident. Fantasy adventure, starring Jason Momoa, Yahya Abdul-Mateen II, Patrick Wilson, Dolph Lundgren, Nicole Kidman and Amber Heard

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A powerful crime kingpin hosts a martial arts tournament on his island lair. A former Shaolin monk is recruited by an intelligence agency to enter the tournament and expose the crime lords opium and slavery rings. He finds himself fighting for his life alongside two Vietnam veterans who are both fleeing their own enemies. Thriller, starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly and Kien Shih

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Economic unrest ensues after King Leopold cuts off access to the Belgian Congo, so years after leaving his old home behind, Tarzan is lured back from Victorian England hoping to stabilise matters. However, he soon finds he has been lured into a deadly trap orchestrated by one of Leopolds envoys. Adventure, starring Alexander Skarsgard, Margot Robbie and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after an absence of several years to find his lost love Lois Lane has moved on with her life. Meanwhile, arch-villain Lex Luthor is out of jail and about to wreak havoc on the world with technology stolen from Supermans home planet of Krypton. Comic-book adventure from X-Men director Bryan Singer, with Brandon Routh, Kevin Spacey, Kate Bosworth and Parker Posey

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Down-and-out stuntman Colt Seavers sets out to find the missing star of his ex-girlfriends blockbuster. Action comedy based on Lee Majors 1980s TV series, starring Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and Hannah Waddingham

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: A cocky test pilot is given a mysterious ring by a dying alien and transported to another world, where he learns he has been recruited into a galactic peacekeeping organisation. He trains to use the incredible powers the ring grants him, and returns to Earth to defend it from a powerful force that feeds on fear. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively, Peter Sarsgaard and Mark Strong

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: A soldier of fortune joins an academic and her conniving brother on an expedition to an ancient Egyptian lost city. The explorers accidentally cause the spirit of a vengeful priest with awe-inspiring supernatural powers to rise from his tomb, leading to a desperate battle for survival. Fantasy action adventure, starring Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz, John Hannah, Arnold Vosloo and Oded Fehr

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones goes in search of the legendary Ark of the Covenant, a biblical artefact of devastating power. His quest leads him to Egypt, where the Nazis are plotting to use the Ark to further Hitlers plans for world domination - aided by Joness deceitful French rival. The first of five big-screen action adventures, starring Harrison Ford as Indy, with Karen Allen, Paul Freeman and John Rhys-Davies

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A powerful crime kingpin hosts a martial arts tournament on his island lair. A former Shaolin monk is recruited by an intelligence agency to enter the tournament and expose the crime lords opium and slavery rings. He finds himself fighting for his life alongside two Vietnam veterans who are both fleeing their own enemies. Thriller, starring Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly and Kien Shih

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Oct 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Wide-eyed kitten Garfield is abandoned by his father Vic and left in an alleyway. Years later, when the ginger moggie has been adopted by long-suffering human Jon Arbuckle, a case of catnapping reunites the pet with his crooked father. Before long, the feline and doggy pal Odie are forced to take part in a heist. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Chris Pratt and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: A leaky boat leaves the precocious youngsters stranded on a jungle island, but their luck changes when explorers the Wild Thornberrys come to their rescue. However, Thornberry dad Nigel loses his memory, so it falls to his daughter Eliza to save the day. Childrens animated adventure, with the voices of Nancy Cartwright, Bruce Willis, Lacey Chabert, Elizabeth Daily and Tim Curry

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Magical beings from folklore, including Santa Claus, Jack Frost and the Easter Bunny, join forces to defeat the plans of an evil spirit, who intends to steal the dreams of children and use the power they grant him to dominate the world. Animated adventure, with the voices of Chris Pine, Alec Baldwin, Hugh Jackman, Isla Fisher and Jude Law

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Following a shipwreck, a robot called Roz survives on an uninhabited island with the help of wild animals. Family animation, with the voices of Lupita Nyongo, Pedro Pascal, Kit Connor and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: Anxiety-crippled mallard Mack spins nightmarish bedtime stories to educate his children, Dax and Gwen, about the perils of straying from the comfort of Moose Head Pond. Eventually Mack organises a spontaneous family migration south from leafy New England to Jamaica, accompanied by curmudgeonly uncle Dan. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Kumail Nanjiani, Elizabeth Banks, Danny DeVito and Carol Kane

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula opens a luxury resort for monsters, to provide a refuge from terrified humans. His cosy sanctuary is disrupted when a normal man unwittingly checks in, and the situation is complicated when the unwanted guest takes a liking to the counts daughter. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Wide-eyed kitten Garfield is abandoned by his father Vic and left in an alleyway. Years later, when the ginger moggie has been adopted by long-suffering human Jon Arbuckle, a case of catnapping reunites the pet with his crooked father. Before long, the feline and doggy pal Odie are forced to take part in a heist. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Chris Pratt and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Animal Instincts
programme.desc: The dark knight joins forces with a team of superheroes including Green Arrow and The Flash to battle the mastermind behind a horse of deadly robotic animals. Animated superhero adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Chris Diamantopoulos

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Mechs vs Mutants
programme.desc: The Dark Knight battles old enemies who have been transformed into giant monsters. Animated superhero adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Oded Fehr

programme.title: The Inventor
programme.desc: Leonardo Da Vinci explores the meaning of life with the help of a French princess. Stop-motion animated adventure, with the voices of Daisy Ridley, Marion Cotillard, Matt Berry and Stephen Fry

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: When their fiendish foes unite against them once more, Batman and Robin attempt to take them down. Animated adventure, with the voices of Adam West, Burt Ward and Julie Newmar, reprising their roles from the 1960s live action series

programme.title: Rock Dog 2: Rock Around the Park
programme.desc: When Bodi and his band True Blue leave Snow Mountain to tour with pop sensation Lil Foxy, they learn that fame comes at a price. Animated comedy, with the voices of Graham Hamilton, Kathleen Barr, Michael Adamthwaite and Ashleigh Ball

programme.title: The Wild Robot
programme.desc: Following a shipwreck, a robot called Roz survives on an uninhabited island with the help of wild animals. Family animation, with the voices of Lupita Nyongo, Pedro Pascal, Kit Connor and Bill Nighy

programme.title: Migration
programme.desc: Anxiety-crippled mallard Mack spins nightmarish bedtime stories to educate his children, Dax and Gwen, about the perils of straying from the comfort of Moose Head Pond. Eventually Mack organises a spontaneous family migration south from leafy New England to Jamaica, accompanied by curmudgeonly uncle Dan. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Kumail Nanjiani, Elizabeth Banks, Danny DeVito and Carol Kane

programme.title: The Emoji Movie
programme.desc: In a world of living ideograms, multi-expressional emoji Gene embarks on a daring mission to find notorious hacker Jailbreak. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of TJ Miller, James Corden and Patrick Stewart

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: A mischievous deer tempts Boog, a domesticated grizzly bear with no survival skills, to try life on the wild side. However, with the hunting season in full swing, all the fearful woodland creatures urge Boog to unleash his inner ferocity and drive the gunmen out of the forest. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Martin Lawrence, Ashton Kutcher, Gary Sinise and Billy Connolly

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: A raccoon trickster is fretting about his debt to a fearsome bear when he stumbles on some animals waking in the woods after their winter nap. Spotting the chance to solve his problem, the raccoon dupes the gullible creatures into stealing food from a nearby suburb so he can give it to the bear - but they fail to realise they will soon be at the mercy of a vermin exterminator. Animated comedy, with the voices of Bruce Willis, Steve Carell, Garry Shandling and William Shatner

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon
programme.desc: A clumsy Viking boy longs to become a mighty dragon slayer and protect his village from the fearsome flying lizards, but his father thinks he is not up to the task. However, when he sets out to prove his worth, he ends up befriending a dragon, and realises his people may have misjudged the creatures. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Jay Baruchel and Gerard Butler

programme.title: Shrek the Third
programme.desc: The bad-tempered ogre finds himself in the unwelcome position of being next in line for the throne. Preferring to stay at home in the swamps, he sets out on a quest to find the rightful heir - a rebellious teenager named Artie - and persuade him to face up to his responsibilities as the future king. Meanwhile, the ambitious Prince Charming sees his chance to take the throne. Animated comedy, with the voices of Mike Myers, Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Eddie Murphy, Antonio Banderas and Rupert Everett

programme.title: The Lego Ninjago Movie
programme.desc: Shunned by everyone for being the son of an evil warlord, a teenager seeks to defeat him with the help of his fellow ninjas. Animated adventure, with the voices of Jackie Chan, Dave Franco and Fred Armisen

programme.title: Open Season
programme.desc: A mischievous deer tempts Boog, a domesticated grizzly bear with no survival skills, to try life on the wild side. However, with the hunting season in full swing, all the fearful woodland creatures urge Boog to unleash his inner ferocity and drive the gunmen out of the forest. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Martin Lawrence, Ashton Kutcher, Gary Sinise and Billy Connolly

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: The animal-loving family heads for Africa, where Eliza discovers unscrupulous poachers are plotting to kill an entire herd of elephants with the aid of a deadly electric fence, leaving her and ever-present pal Darwin to save the day. Animated adventure, with the voices of Lacey Chabert, Tim Curry, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Lynn Redgrave and Jodi Carlisle

programme.title: Fox and Hare Save the Forest
programme.desc: A fox and a hare embark on a journey to find their missing owl friend. Animated adventure, with the voices of Teresa Gallagher, Dan Skinner and Sarah Madigan

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight and his allies pursue four supervillains who have joined forces to cause havoc on Halloween. They discover the gang is working for the Joker, who has a grander scheme in mind - unleashing a computer virus that will make every piece of technology in Gotham City obey his commands. Animated adventure, with the voices of Roger Craig Smith and Troy Baker

programme.title: Lego DC Comics Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash traps The Flash in a time loop so he is forced to relive the same day

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: An unlikely pair of brothers, who were born as the result of a one-off genetic experiment and separated at birth, are reunited in adulthood. They set out on a cross-country search for their unknown mother - fending off vicious loan sharks and a professional assassin along the way. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Danny DeVito, Kelly Preston and Chloe Webb

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: Divorced couple Jane and Jake are reunited at their sons college graduation after 10 years apart, and end up sleeping together. Despite Jakes marriage to a younger woman and Janes fledgling romance with a kindly architect, the pair end up having a clandestine affair. Romantic comedy, starring Meryl Streep, Alec Baldwin and Steve Martin

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: Cynical, hard-drinking teacher Elizabeth Halsey hates her job and the kids in her class, and hopes to escape her daily grind by landing a rich husband. A wealthy substitute seems like a suitable candidate, but she has a rival for his attention in a squeaky-clean colleague. Comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Jason Segel and Lucy Punch

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Ten interlinked stories of people searching for and finding love. While the newly elected, bachelor British prime minister is smitten by a junior staff member at 10 Downing Street, a heartbroken writer heads for France to get over a failed relationship, and a faded rock star aims to reinvent himself in time for Christmas. Richard Curtiss romantic comedy, with Hugh Grant, Martine McCutcheon, Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Colin Firth, Bill Nighy and Liam Neeson

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Bumbling scientist Sherman Klump is engaged to be married and determined to rid himself of his troublesome alter ego Buddy Love for ever. All his problems look set to be solved by his fiancees latest DNA experiment - but things are about to spiral out of control. Comedy sequel, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles, along with Janet Jackson and Larry Miller

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: A family tragedy woos Delia Deetz, daughter Lydia and rebellious teenage granddaughter Astrid back to the close-knit community of Winter River. Astrid accidentally opens a portal to the afterlife by summoning Beetlejuice three times. The mischievous demon ricochets between realms, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Tim Burtons comedy sequel, starring Michael Keaton, Winona Ryder and Jenna Ortega

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An idealistic lawyer catches the attention of a real-estate tycoon, who offers her a job. She starts out thinking she can change his venal ways, but quickly tires of running his life for him. Finding himself in desperate need of her support, the self-absorbed millionaire pulls out all the stops to win her back. Romantic comedy, starring Sandra Bullock, Hugh Grant, Alicia Witt and Dana Ivey

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A vet working at a Hawaiian zoo falls madly in love with a beautiful woman and pulls out all the stops to romance her. However, his attempts to woo her are seriously undermined by the fact that she suffers from short-term memory loss, meaning he has to resume his courtship from scratch every day. Romantic comedy, starring Drew Barrymore, Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two hapless Americans get caught up in the machinations of the Mob, and are forced to deliver a cash-stuffed envelope to a mysterious Mr Smith in a far corner of Australia - but a wily kangaroo bounds off with the money, leaving the friends desperate to retrieve it before the gangsters catch up with them. Comedy, starring Jerry OConnell, Christopher Walken, Anthony Anderson and Estella Warren

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: A woman struggling to cope with a rebellious daughter and a marriage that has strayed into a rocky patch discovers a shocking family secret - her parents marriage is not legal. She decides to try and resolve the situation by getting the family to rally round and organise the most elaborate wedding imaginable. Romantic comedy sequel, starring Nia Vardalos and John Corbett

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Barton Academy boarding school teacher Paul Hunham incurs the wrath of headmaster Dr Hardy Woodrup by failing the son of a powerful senator. As punishment, Woodrup selects Paul to remain on campus over Christmas to chaperone the boys who wont be travelling home for the holidays. Alexander Paynes comedy drama, starring Paul Giamatti, DaVine Joy Randolph and Dominic Sessa

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: An Eastern European en route to America is stranded at JFK Airport when a coup in his native country leaves him in a diplomatic no-mans land. His nation ceases to exist, meaning he can neither return home nor set foot on the streets of New York. Stuck indefinitely inside the terminal, he sets out to make some sort of a life for himself. Steven Spielbergs comedy, with Tom Hanks, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Stanley Tucci and Chi McBride

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: An architect has a fling with a kooky waitress, who takes it upon herself to move into his house and pass herself off as his wife. When the woman he is actually in love with says she thinks the sham marriage is good for him, he decides to play along with the deception. Romantic comedy, starring Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn, Dana Delany, Donald Moffat and Julie Harris

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When best friends and roommates Dreux and Alyssa discover the latters boyfriend has blown their rent money, the duo faces a race against time to avoid eviction. Comedy, starring Keke Palmer and SZA

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: When New York University professor Rachel Chu heads to Singapore with her boyfriend, Nick Young, shes surprised to learn hes from an extremely wealthy family. The problem is they arent so approving of her, so she attempts to win them over. Blockbusting comedy based on Kevin Kwans novel, starring Constance Wu, Henry Golding, Gemma Chan and Michelle Yeoh

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Thirtysomething slacker Dupree finds himself out of a job with nowhere to live, and turns to his newly married best friend Carl for a place to stay. But Carl comes to regret his act of hospitality as the layabout shows no sign of ever moving out - not to mention his annoyance when his new wife takes a liking to their laid-back guest. Comedy, starring Owen Wilson, Matt Dillon, Kate Hudson and Michael Douglas.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack, a struggling musician, gets hit by a bus during a mysterious event. When he regains consciousness, he finds that he is the only person who can remember the Beatles, and sets out to exploit the opportunity by passing their hits off as his own compositions. Danny Boyles comedy, starring Himesh Patel and Lily James

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Having settled their differences, Brad and Dustys newfound friendship is put to the test when their respective fathers - one gentle, the other overly macho - arrive for the Christmas holidays, forcing them to change their plans. What starts as a break at a fun-filled trip to a luxury resort turns into something far more chaotic. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell, Mark Wahlberg, Mel Gibson and John Lithgow

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: Under heavy pressure from her father, Beca reluctantly starts her first year at Barden University and gets an internship at the school radio station. She soon acquires a new circle of friends in the form of a band of misfits with a shared talent for singing, joining their a cappella group and trying to inject some much needed energy into their repertoire. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Brittany Snow, Anna Camp, Rebel Wilson and Skylar Astin

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: An Eastern European en route to America is stranded at JFK Airport when a coup in his native country leaves him in a diplomatic no-mans land. His nation ceases to exist, meaning he can neither return home nor set foot on the streets of New York. Stuck indefinitely inside the terminal, he sets out to make some sort of a life for himself. Steven Spielbergs comedy, with Tom Hanks, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Stanley Tucci and Chi McBride

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs the World
programme.desc: A directionless bassist meets the girl of his dreams, but finds that romancing her comes with a dangerous catch. She has seven evil ex-lovers, all endowed with tremendous fighting skills or superpowers - and before he can go out with her, he is expected to face each one in a battle to the death. Comedy adventure, starring Michael Cera, Mary Elizabeth Winstead and Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: A veteran lifeguard commands a highly trained team that keeps the sun-kissed resort of Emerald Bay safe. As he breaks in some new recruits - including an insubordinate former Olympic swimmer - he has to contend with a dangerous new drug sweeping the beach. Action comedy based on the TV series, starring Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario and Priyanka Chopra

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: A portly Mexican friar working as a cook in an orphanage adopts the guise of a masked wrestler. He teams up with a thief and enters a tournament hoping to win enough money to sort out the monasterys financial problems, feed the kids under his care and impress the nun he is in love with. Comedy, starring Jack Black and Ana de la Reguera

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: An orphaned girl befriends a benevolent giant, who takes her off to a magical land, where they attempt to stop the man-eating creatures that are invading the human world. Steven Spielbergs fantasy adventure based on Roald Dahls book, starring Mark Rylance, Ruby Barnhill and Penelope Wilton

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: The plucky talking mouse feels left out when the son of his adopted human family makes a new pal - but quickly forgets such trifling matters when his high-flying canary friend is captured by an evil falcon, prompting the brave rodent to mount a daring rescue. Family adventure sequel, with Geena Davis, Hugh Laurie and Jonathan Lipnicki, and the voices of Michael J Fox, Melanie Griffith and James Woods

programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.desc: For the tenacious 11-year-old Robin and her loyal band of friends, the Hoods, the patch of overgrown scrubland at the end of their cul-de-sac is a magical kingdom. However, when the slippery property developer Clipboard dazzles the parents of the area with promises of health spas and day-care facilities, the gang risk losing their kingdom forever. Director Phil Hawkins comedy, starring Naomie Harris, Darcey Ewart, Gwendoline Christie and Mark Williams

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: In modern-day London, Oliver Twist is a talented graffiti artist who is lured into a street gang headed by Fagin. Before long, he and his hustlers plan the heist of the century. Director Martin Owens update to Charles Dickens Oliver Twist, starring Michael Caine, Lena Headey, Noel Clarke, and Sally Collett, who also wrote the screenplay

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Sam, a fearless young girl raised outside of her Maori culture, is determined to connect with a mountain in the hope it can cure her cancer. Along the way she meets new friends Mallory and Bronco. Co-writer/director Rachel Houses comedy, starring Elizabeth Atkinson, Reuben Francis, Terence Daniel and Byron Coll

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writers block, but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife. That leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current spouse of five years. Director Edward Halls take on the Noel Coward comedy, starring Isla Fisher, Dan Stevens and Leslie Mann

programme.title: Cats and Dogs
programme.desc: In his quest for world domination, a power-mad Persian cat plots to sabotage a scientists plans to cure all humans who are allergic to dogs. A heroic puppy joins a force of canine secret agents to foil his schemes. Comedy, starring Jeff Goldblum and Elizabeth Perkins, and featuring the voices of Tobey Maguire, Alec Baldwin, Susan Sarandon and Sean Hayes

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: The blue hedgehog, Knuckles and Tails reunite to face the might of the villainous Shadow, who possesses powers unlike anything they have seen before. Outmuscled on every front, Sonic seeks help from an unlikely source, Dr Ivo Robotnik. Fantasy adventure sequel based on the videogame, starring Jim Carrey, James Marsden and Tika Sumpter

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie ODonnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Lao Luo is a washed-up stuntman with a deformed horse called Red Hare, who he saved from euthanasia. The duo become overnight sensations when a fight with debt collectors goes viral. Writer/director Larry Yangs action drama, starring Jackie Chan, Liu Haocun and Kevin Guo. In Mandarin, with subtitles

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: The plucky sea creature sets out to prove his boss Mr Krabs is innocent of stealing Neptunes crown. However, the missing item has ended up in sinister Shell City, which all sea-dwellers fear and from which few have ever returned. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny, Bill Fagerbakke, Clancy Brown and Scarlett Johansson, plus a cameo appearance by David Hasselhoff

programme.title: The Cinema List
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: In modern-day London, Oliver Twist is a talented graffiti artist who is lured into a street gang headed by Fagin. Before long, he and his hustlers plan the heist of the century. Director Martin Owens update to Charles Dickens Oliver Twist, starring Michael Caine, Lena Headey, Noel Clarke, and Sally Collett, who also wrote the screenplay

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writers block, but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife. That leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current spouse of five years. Director Edward Halls take on the Noel Coward comedy, starring Isla Fisher, Dan Stevens and Leslie Mann

Outmuscled on every front, Sonic seeks help from an unlikely source, Dr Ivo Robotnik. Fantasy adventure sequel based on the videogame, starring Jim Carrey, James Marsden and Tika Sumpter

A heroic puppy joins a force of canine secret agents to foil his schemes. Comedy, starring Jeff Goldblum and Elizabeth Perkins, and featuring the voices of Tobey Maguire, Alec Baldwin, Susan Sarandon and Sean Hayes

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: A reporter discovers four humanoid amphibians who live in the sewers of New York, and use their martial arts skills to fight crime. She helps them as they face their toughest challenge yet - defeating a sinister criminal organisation that seems to have power over the entire city. Fantasy adventure, starring Megan Fox and William Fichtner, with the voice of Johnny Knoxville

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: The bumbling fool wins first prize in the church raffle - a trip to France and a video camera. His travels cause chaos as he disrupts a film shoot in Cannes, to the fury of its megalomaniac director, and is then accused of kidnapping a youngster. Comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson, Willem Dafoe, Emma de Caunes and Max Baldry

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures flee from an evil wizard, only to end up magically transported to modern-day New York. They search for a way to get back to their own village while evading their enemy, who has followed them to the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, with Neil Patrick Harris, Hank Azaria and Jayma Mays, plus voices of Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures and their human friends go on a rescue mission to Paris. Their old foe Gargamel the evil wizard has created mischievous smurfs of his own and kidnapped Smurfette to learn the secret of her magic. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Hank Azaria and Neil Patrick Harris, with the voices of Katy Perry and Christina Ricci

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: Two Second World War evacuees face a dilemma when they meet a German pilot who has been shot down. Family drama, starring John Bardon and Stacey Tendeter

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: Two youngsters unwittingly unleash all manner of monsters from a locked manuscript they find in an abandoned house. Comedy sequel, starring Madison Iseman, Jeremy Ray Taylor and Wendy McLendon-Covey

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The cast of a cancelled sci-fi series are reduced to a life of conventions and public appearances, only to find themselves genuinely transported into space. Naive aliens have mistaken the show for real life and want the actors to help defend them from an evil extraterrestrial warlord. Sci-fi comedy, starring Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman and Sam Rockwell

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Two heavy-metal fans broadcast an amateur TV programme from their basement. A slimy network executive offers them the chance to turn professional, but as they enjoy the perks of wealth and fame, they find their show being ruined by corporate interference. Comedy, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Rob Lowe, Tia Carrere and Lara Flynn Boyle, with a cameo by Alice Cooper

programme.title: Waynes World 2
programme.desc: Heavy metal fanatics Wayne and Garth try to stage a giant Woodstock-style rock festival, with a little help from a spaced-out British roadie and the ghost of Jim Morrison. But Wayne also has to stop his girlfriend leaving him for her slimy manager. Comedy sequel, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Ralph Brown, Kim Basinger, Tia Carrere and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: Fast-talking Detroit cop Axel Foley heads for Los Angeles after an old friend is murdered before his eyes. His search for the killers leads him into conflict with a seemingly untouchable drug kingpin, but he also has to contend with the local force, who do not want him taking matters into his own hands. Comedy thriller, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Ronny Cox, John Ashton and Steven Berkoff

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: Wisecracking Detroit detective Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles to investigate the shooting of an old friend, and uncovers a connection with a spate of violent robberies carried out by a criminal who leaves a mysterious calling card. Comedy thriller sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, John Ashton, Ronny Cox and Brigitte Nielsen.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Maverick cop Axel Foley returns to Los Angeles when an investigation into a colleagues murder leads him to a Hollywood theme park. He enlists the help of old ally Rosewood to prove the resort is a cover for a major counterfeiting ring connected to a terrorist conspiracy. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Theresa Randle and Bronson Pinchot.

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: A baseball player is stunned to learn he has come into a massive inheritance. Unfortunately, there is one condition - he must somehow find a way to spend $30million in just one month, or he will lose the lot. Meanwhile, two scheming lawyers, who stand to get the money if he fails, are determined to sabotage his efforts. Comedy, starring Richard Pryor, John Candy, Lonette McKee and Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An eccentric but brilliant former cop sets himself up to champion the underdog - as a private eye specialising in locating missing animals. The zany detective is called in to find a kidnapped dolphin - the mascot of an American football team - and uncovers a plot involving high-level police corruption. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Courteney Cox, Sean Young, Tone Loc and Noble Willingham

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: The eccentric pet detective is coaxed out of self-imposed exile in a Buddhist monastery to visit Africa and help search for a sacred white bat. However, his unique investigative talents are tested to the limits as he faces a race against time to find the missing creature and prevent a tribal war. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey, Simon Callow and Bob Gunton

programme.title: Waynes World
programme.desc: Two heavy-metal fans broadcast an amateur TV programme from their basement. A slimy network executive offers them the chance to turn professional, but as they enjoy the perks of wealth and fame, they find their show being ruined by corporate interference. Comedy, starring Mike Myers, Dana Carvey, Rob Lowe, Tia Carrere and Lara Flynn Boyle, with a cameo by Alice Cooper

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Anxious family man Gil Buckman is determined to have a better relationship with his three children than he had with his tough father. Elsewhere, his two sisters are also having family problems - one is struggling to understand her two troubled teenagers, while the others husband wants to turn their toddler into a child genius. Comedy drama, starring Steve Martin, Keanu Reeves, Mary Steenburgen, Jason Robards and Dianne Wiest

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teenagers parents forget her birthday, so she tries to get over her disappointment by searching for the man of her dreams, unaware shes looking in the wrong place. Comedy drama, starring Molly Ringwald, Justin Henry and Anthony Michael Hall

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: The ragtag soldiers of the Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard are given the chance to prove their mettle by apprehending three German aviators who have parachuted into the country in the vanguard of a suspected Nazi invasion. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Arthur Lowe, John Le Mesurier, Clive Dunn, Bill Pertwee, Ian Lavender and Arnold Ridley

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Oct 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Anxious family man Gil Buckman is determined to have a better relationship with his three children than he had with his tough father. Elsewhere, his two sisters are also having family problems - one is struggling to understand her two troubled teenagers, while the others husband wants to turn their toddler into a child genius. Comedy drama, starring Steve Martin, Keanu Reeves, Mary Steenburgen, Jason Robards and Dianne Wiest

Childrens adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A man makes the mistake of engaging a cable TV installer in conversation in a ploy to get all the channels for free. However, the manic repairman shows an invincible determination to be his new best friend - and does not take kindly to rejection. Comedy directed by Ben Stiller, starring Jim Carrey, Matthew Broderick and George Segal

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An eccentric but brilliant former cop sets himself up to champion the underdog - as a private eye specialising in locating missing animals. The zany detective is called in to find a kidnapped dolphin - the mascot of an American football team - and uncovers a plot involving high-level police corruption. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Courteney Cox, Sean Young, Tone Loc and Noble Willingham

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: The eccentric pet detective is coaxed out of self-imposed exile in a Buddhist monastery to visit Africa and help search for a sacred white bat. However, his unique investigative talents are tested to the limits as he faces a race against time to find the missing creature and prevent a tribal war. Comedy sequel, starring Jim Carrey, Simon Callow and Bob Gunton

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: An obese, terminally shy professor invents a potion that transforms him into a slim, loud-mouthed charmer. His new streamlined self immediately sets out to woo the woman of his dreams - but soon starts to ride roughshod over everything he used to care about. Remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis comedy, starring Eddie Murphy, Jada Pinkett Smith, James Coburn and Larry Miller

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: A Honolulu resident returns home after two years in the army and defies his parents wish that he work in the family pineapple business. He has set his heart on carving his own niche and makes a start by taking a job at a tourist agency. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Angela Lansbury, Joan Blackman and Roland Winters. Songs featured include Cant Help Falling in Love and Rock-a-Hula Baby.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: A silent-movie star tries to win the heart of an aspiring actress as the introduction of sound changes the film business for ever. However, his frequent on-screen love interest does not take kindly to this real-life romance. Musical comedy, starring Gene Kelly, Debbie Reynolds, Donald OConnor, Jean Hagen and Millard Mitchell. Songs include Make em Laugh, You Are My Lucky Star and the title number

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A cockney lothario leads a charmed life, enjoying casual sex with as many women as possible with no thought of the consequences. However, a series of unexpected setbacks forces him to finally take stock of his life. Comedy drama based on the play by Bill Naughton, starring Michael Caine, Jane Asher, Millicent Martin, Shirley Anne Field, Shelley Winters and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Blue Hawaii
programme.desc: A Honolulu resident returns home after two years in the army and defies his parents wish that he work in the family pineapple business. He has set his heart on carving his own niche and makes a start by taking a job at a tourist agency. Musical, starring Elvis Presley, Angela Lansbury, Joan Blackman and Roland Winters. Songs featured include Cant Help Falling in Love and Rock-a-Hula Baby.

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A man makes the mistake of engaging a cable TV installer in conversation in a ploy to get all the channels for free. However, the manic repairman shows an invincible determination to be his new best friend - and does not take kindly to rejection. Comedy directed by Ben Stiller, starring Jim Carrey, Matthew Broderick and George Segal

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The cast of a cancelled sci-fi series are reduced to a life of conventions and public appearances, only to find themselves genuinely transported into space. Naive aliens have mistaken the show for real life and want the actors to help defend them from an evil extraterrestrial warlord. Sci-fi comedy, starring Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman and Sam Rockwell

programme.title: Madame Web
programme.desc: Thirty years after her scientist mother died whilst giving birth in the Peruvian Amazon, New York paramedic Cassandra Cassie Webb saves lives without forming any emotional attachments besides her level-headed work partner, Ben. A routine call-out almost ends in tragedy and Cassie experiences disorienting visions which suggest she is predisposed to glimpse the future and subtly alter the course of history through her actions. This magical clairvoyance pinpoints Ezekiel Sims before he attempts to kill three young women, Julia Cornwall, Mattie Franklin and Anya Corazon. Fantasy adventure, starring Dakota Johnson, Tahar Rahim and Sydney Sweeney

programme.title: Venom: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Journalist Eddie Brock and symbiote partner-in-crime Venom are lying low in Mexico City, on the run for the apparent murder of detective Patrick Mulligan. The cop and his bonded entity, Toxin, are actually alive at the Imperium symbiote containment programme, beneath the Area 51 US Air Force facility in the Nevada desert. Knull, the symbiotes immortal creator, dispatches hunters to locate Venoms hidden power source, the Codex, which can set Knull free to terrorise the multiverse. Fantasy adventure, starring Tom Hardy, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Stephen Graham and Juno Temple

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: A clumsy teenager develops superhuman powers after a genetically engineered spider bites him. At first his fantastic skills delight him, but his elation is severely tempered by a family tragedy, prompting him to dedicate his talents to combating evil. However, he faces a baptism of fire in the form of crazed villain the Green Goblin. Comic-book superhero adventure, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Willem Dafoe, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Peter Parker continues his fight for justice, but unrequited love and personal worries take their toll and he is tempted to abandon his web-slinging alter ego. However, the arrival of deadly new bad guy Doctor Octopus plunges him into a race against time to save New York. Comic-book adventure sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst, Alfred Molina, James Franco and Rosemary Harris

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging heros darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncles murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his fathers villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
programme.desc: A gifted teenager investigates the secrets hidden in his dead parents past, leading him to a mysterious corporation and an incident that imbues him with superhuman powers. A personal tragedy drives him to use his new-found abilities to fight crime, and he is soon drawn into a deadly battle against a former colleague of his father, who has undergone a devastating transformation of his own. Superhero adventure reboot, starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone and Rhys Ifans

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: The webslinging hero battles a powerful new enemy when a downtrodden engineer develops lethal electrical powers, which he unleashes on those he believes have betrayed him. As if that wasnt enough to keep him busy, he faces an even greater threat when he is reunited with an unstable old friend who has been charged with a sinister mission by his dying father, leading to a series of tense confrontations that threaten to change his life for ever. Superhero adventure sequel, starring Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Jamie Foxx and Dane DeHaan

programme.title: Spider-Man

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Oct 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: After a whirlwind night of romance with a terminally ill man, a woman commits to helping him spend his last days living life to the fullest. Drama, starring Isabelle Fuhrman, Mena Massoud, Jennifer Grey and Kelsey Grammer. Co-written, produced and directed by Julia Stiles

programme.title: Juliet and Romeo
programme.desc: Two lovers find themselves central figures in a journey of battles and betrayal. Musical version of the classic tale, starring Clara Rugaard, Jamie Ward, Rebel Wilson and Jason Isaacs

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her sons science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Mila Jankovic, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the woman of his dreams is kidnapped, a man turns an inability to feel physical pain into an unexpected advantage in his quest to rescue her. Action comedy, starring Jack Quaid, Ray Nicholson and Amber Midthunder

programme.title: Grow
programme.desc: Rivals pull every trick in the book to win a pumpkin-growing contest, but it remains to be seen whether farmer Dinah Little and her talented niece, Charlie, will come out on top. Comedy, starring Nick Frost, Golda Rosheuvel and Priya-Rose Brookwell

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: An estate agent is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. Action comedy, starring Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir and Lio Tipton

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: Recently widowed Bridget enters the dating game once again, caught between her sons science teacher and a man 20 years her junior. Romantic comedy, starring Renee Zellweger, Mila Jankovic, Hugh Grant and Colin Firth

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final shift, a burned-out paramedic has to train his keen but inexperienced replacement. What begins as a routine night soon descends into a chaotic, citywide odyssey that tests their endurance. Co-writer/director Christopher Leones action comedy, starring Rainn Wilson, Lil Rel Howery and Aimee Carrero

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: After a young girl bursts into their home psychiatry practice claiming an entity is feeding on her, Jordan and her clairvoyant mother must find a way to stop the evil. Horror, starring Shawn Ashmore and Ashley Greene

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: After a family barricade themselves inside their remote farmhouse when a creature attacks, a father slowly transforms into something unrecognisable. Werewolf horror from The Invisible Man director Leigh Whannell, starring Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth and Sam Jaeger

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed. Horror starring Tanner Stine and Kaylee Kaneshiro

programme.title: Spin the Bottle

The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed. Horror starring Tanner Stine and Kaylee Kaneshiro

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: The world has been reduced to rubble by a massive earthquake, and in the heart of Seoul there is only one rsediential building left standing - Hwang Gung Apartments. Outsiders start coming to the flats, and feeling a threat to their survival, the residents enact a special measure. South Korean drama with subtitles, starring Lee Byung-hun and Park Seo-joon

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: A man living in a bleak future years after a nuclear war has fake memories of being a secret agent implanted into his brain. However, the procedure uncovers the fact that he really is a spy with his memory erased, and he is forced to become a fugitive from the totalitarian government. Sci-fi thriller remake, with Colin Farrell, Kate Beckinsale and Jessica Biel

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: In a world dominated by deadly robots, resistance leader John Connor fights to stop the creation of an advanced new terminator, and searches for the teenager destined to go back in time and become his father. Elsewhere, a mysterious stranger with no memory is about to learn the shocking truth about his origins. Sci-fi thriller sequel, starring Christian Bale, Sam Worthington and Anton Yelchin

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: An astronaut attempts to stay sane while on a troubled mission to Saturns moon, Titan. Director Mikael Hafstroms sci-fi thriller, starring Casey Affleck, Laurence Fishburne, Emily Beecham and David Morrissey

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: An inexperienced military officer is sent to the front line in a war against an alien invasion, and dies within minutes. However, at the point of death, he is transported back in time to relive his last day again. As he faces the same battle over and over again, the experience he gains turns him into the ultimate warrior. Sci-fi adventure based on Hiroshi Sakurazakas novel All You Need Is Kill, starring Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious unchartered island in the Pacific, a team of scientists embark on a top-secret mission to the same region. Things soon descend into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming, and they must battle to escape from the domain of the mighty Kong. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet malfunctions. As woken travelling companions Jim Preston and Aurora Lane fall in love, they are soon on a collision course with more technical problems and a dark secret. Sci-fi drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt and Michael Sheen

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist tests an invisibility serum on himself, but becomes dangerously intoxicated by the power he acquires. He abandons his morals and heads out into the city to take full advantage of his condition. Realising he has been up to no good, concerned colleagues decide to confront him - with terrible consequences. Paul Verhoevens sci-fi thriller, starring Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue, Josh Brolin and Kim Dickens

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: In the future, a company has extended human life with artificial organs - but they charge a hefty price, and those who do not make their payments can suffer fatal repossessions. One of the companys debt collectors starts to question his career when he ends up with a mechanical heart, and when he cannot pay, his own partner is sent to recover it. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jude Law and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview-Oct 2025
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky

programme.title: The Cinema List: Horror Villains
programme.desc: This Halloween, face terror in every form: from the haunted halls of The Shining to the unseen menace of The Invisible Man, this collection delivers horror at its finest

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In central Europe during 2041, a female detective investigates the case of a slain couple where a restoration team is able to bring one of them back to life. Sci-fi thriller, starring Andrea Mohylova, Matej Hádek and Milan Ondrík

programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A Florida woman decides to solve time travel in order to go back and be the person she always intended. Sci-fi drama, starring Mary-Louise Parker and Ayo Edebiri

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: A mutated virus sweeps across America, turning most of the population into hideous flesh-eating zombies. A hard-drinking fearless adventurer leads a small band of young survivors on a perilous journey through the wasteland in search of a safe haven. Comedy horror, with Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg, Emma Stone and Abigail Breslin

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious unchartered island in the Pacific, a team of scientists embark on a top-secret mission to the same region. Things soon descend into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming, and they must battle to escape from the domain of the mighty Kong. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A Manhattan-based military scientist finds himself immune to a virus that turns humans into ferocious vampire-like creatures. After the disease has swept across the world, wiping out an estimated 90 per cent of the human population, he devotes his solitary existence to finding a cure by unlocking the secret within his blood. Sci-fi thriller, starring Will Smith, Alice Braga and Charlie Tahan

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: A streetwise cop is enlisted by a top-secret government force dedicated to policing alien visitors to Earth, teaming up with a veteran agent just as a body-swapping extraterrestrial giant insect begins a reign of terror throughout New York City. Sci-fi comedy, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Linda Fiorentino, Rip Torn and Vincent DOnofrio

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Agent J investigates the unauthorised landing of a spacecraft and discovers a malevolent alien disguised as a lingerie model is on the verge of destroying humanity. His only hope of stopping her diabolical plot is to restore the memory of his retired partner K - but his former mentor takes more than a little convincing. Sci-fi comedy sequel, directed by Barry Sonnenfeld, starring Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Rosario Dawson, Lara Flynn Boyle, Johnny Knoxville, Rip Torn and Tony Shalhoub

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: An alien criminal escapes from a prison on the moon and goes back in time on a mission of revenge, changing the course of history. Agent J of the top-secret Earth defence organisation follows him back to 1969, and joins forces with a younger version of his mentor Agent K to set things right. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Will Smith, Josh Brolin and Tommy Lee Jones

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster epic, starring John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: A woman is condemned to squander her life in pursuit of a man who does not return her admiration, and she only comes to her senses after lingering briefly in heavenly limbo. Fantasy comedy, written, directed by and starring Alice Lowe, with Jacob Anderson, Nick Frost and Tanya Reynolds

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: An abused woman flees for her life and takes refuge with a family. It later appears that Cecilia Kasss ex has killed himself and shes due to inherit a fortune, but the fact he was experimenting with an invisibility suit makes her think hes come after her. Thriller, starring Elisabeth Moss, Oliver Jackson-Cohen and Harriet Dyer

programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts argue over whether theyre better off spending their remaining days as friends or something more. Romantic comedy, starring Anthony Mackie and Zoe Chao

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A respected academic goes on the run when he is framed for the murder of a French historian. Pursued by the detective on the case and a sinister assassin monk, he strives to unmask the culprit, leading to a conspiracy determined to preserve a 2,000-year-old secret at any cost. Thriller based on Dan Browns novel, starring Tom Hanks, Audrey Tautou, Ian McKellen, Paul Bettany and Jean Reno

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. Pope Pius XVI has died suddenly and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind involving a stolen canister of anti-matter. Ron Howard takes the reins once again for the sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks, Ewan McGregor, Ayelet Zurer, Stellan Skarsgard and Pierfrancesco Favino

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Following his life-or-death missions in The Da Vinci Code, and Angels and Demons, long suffering expert Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the symbologist suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Director Ron Howards conversion of the Dan Brown thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.desc: When a gay man and a Jewish woman stand as candidates for the city council, Will and Grace decide to hold separate fundraising events. Jack forces Karen and Elliot to spend time together, and they reach a new understanding. Starring Eric McCormack and Debra Messing

programme.title: Will and Grace
programme.desc: Part one of two. The pairs plans for a family-free Thanksgiving dinner are cut short when Graces mother decides she needs her daughters company and Jack announces his stepdad wants to meet Elliot. Comedy, guest starring Beau Bridges, Blythe Danner and Debbie Reynolds

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Dan is injured while working for DJ, who could be fired if his dad decides to sue the company for negligence

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Ben offers Mark free piano lessons and Darlene uses it as an opportunity to test his parenting skills, while Jackie throws Becky a baby shower

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: The girls wonder whether people pursue secretive relationships because they are embarrassed about their lovers, while Carrie suspects Big is ashamed of her when he stands her up at a promotional event

programme.title: Sex and the City
programme.desc: Carrie and Samantha consider the prospect of monogamous relationships, and Miranda becomes possessive of Skipper after seeing him with another woman. Meanwhile, Charlotte is surprised by her latest mans sexual demands. Comedy, starring Sarah Jessica Parker

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Hannah has a tense meeting with an acclaimed author she once admired regarding some disturbing allegations surrounding him

programme.title: Girls
programme.desc: Hannah interviews an influential writer who offers her some advice on being a female writer, while Adam and Jessa plan a creative endeavour

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Michael tries to change Stanleys attitude after being snapped at, Dwight decides to buy Andys car, and Pam deals with a problem after spending the night with Jim

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Jim takes to the golf course with Andy and Kevin in the hope of landing a major client, and Michael sets up a stall at a job fair at Pams college to hire a summer intern

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Darlene mulls over a life-changing offer, Jackie heads to the bottom of the bottle and Beckys hopes of a happily ever after are jeopardised

programme.title: The Conners
programme.desc: Jackie steps into the role of paternal figure in the wake of Emilios deportation, while Darlene becomes entangled in a complex love triangle

programme.title: The Office (US)
programme.desc: Part one of two. After Angela refuses to give in to Michaels unreasonable demands, Phyllis takes over the party planning committee and throws a huge bash for Tobys goodbye party

programme.title: The Office (US)
